1158.title: pilotConverter.sit
1158.author: Anonymous
1158.description: Something that should have been made when EVO(Escape Velocity Override) first came out: Pilot Converter. Pilot Converter reads pilot files from the original Escape Velocity and converts the data to Escape Velocity:Override pilot files. Now you don't need to make a new pilot if you want to keep playing in the original EV universe using one of the EVC (Escape Velocity Classic)plugins made for use with EVO.

3389.title: Flying High 1.6
3389.author: James Hoffman
3389.description:
Wander in a universe where seemingly everyone is crazy...except you, of course.  Everywhere you go, there will be some reason to fight someone, explore something here or there, or turn on your allies with perfect legitimacy.

A full array of weapons, outfits, and ships is in play.  Fleets and specialty vessels to intercept you to make the game challenging and fun.  Lots to do, lots to explore, and the ships are very colorful, so it\'ll be nice to look at.

Enjoy!

3434.title: Blackthorne Kestrel
3434.author: General Cade Smart
3434.description: This plug-in makes the Kestrel you get in the Deliver Kestrel Parts mission have a truthful description about how much it is weaker than the Atinoda Kestrel. Also included is a plug-in to that gives you a easier way to get the mission Deliver Kestrel Parts. Makes it possible to get the mission in all Independent systems with 100% possiblity. No combat rating required either- you can get the mission as soon as you start the pilot. Though you might die if you try to do the mission in a weak ship like a Scoutship (due to Pirates attacking on the way).

722.title: EVOCompleteMap.sit
722.author: Anonymous
722.description: A complete map of the EV universe, including planet names, planetary alignment/governent, hyperspace jump links, and a legend.  In 32 bit PICT format.

785.title: ClaviusAndBeyond 333
785.author: Anonymous
785.description: Fight against a pro-Confed extremist movement and use new weapons, beat off an alien invasion, discover an ancient civilization... Land on Clavius Station, and depending on your combat skills, you will be able to pilot the famous Neutronic Kestrel Interceptor, a sleek, fast and powerful vessel. Just go to Clavius Station and the adventure will start... Dogfights, powerful ships, terrifying weapons and... love: Clavius and Beyond contains all a space adventurer wants from life! This is the last update to Clavius and Beyond and was actually released back in 2000 but has only just found its way to the addons pages now.

1142.title: EVIcons.sea
1142.author: Anonymous
1142.description:
EV Icons 1.0 is a collection of icons of all the ships in Escape Velocity. 
With EV Icons you can change the icon of any folder/program from that grey
folder to a ship from Escape Velocity.blackviper_05@yahoo.com

1129.title: EV-Names.sit
1129.author: Anonymous
1129.description:
EV-Names is a small (VERY small) tool for helping Escape Velocity designers to come up with names for systems and stellar objects.

How it works: EV-Names takes a random beginning string from it's STR# resource (ID#128) and then randomly adds strings to the end of that string from the other STR# resource (ID#129).  If you know your way around ResEdit, feel free to change the STR# resources however you choose.

1132.title: EVAG.sit
1132.author: Anonymous
1132.description: EV Animated GIFs is a collection of animated gifs of all of the ships in Escape Velocity. They were made for 'webmasters' of sites that have to do with Escape Velocity. If you use them, make sure you give credit to EVula, the animator.

1137.title: EVDevelopersMap
1137.author: Anonymous
1137.description: EV Developers Map is a tool that lets you view, create and edit systems for the use in the game Escape Velocity. Ive put much work into it, so I hope you enjoy it and find it useful.

3416.title: Flying High 2.0
3416.author: James Hoffman
3416.description:
Flying High 2.0 sports various changes to mission weaponry, ship balance, and a few graphic changes from earlier versions.  Missions are undergoing ever more and more polishing for a smoothe ride.

Play for 4 (or 5) different governments, with at least 30 missions each.  Full complements of outfits, weapons, and ships, as well as side-missions to keep you occupied.

Enjoy the rainbow fleets!

910.title: GS
910.author: Anonymous
910.description: Galactic Scourge (1.4.5) extends the EV universe with 15 new governments, 140 new missions, 70 new items, (30 of them weapons), 38 new ships, 100 new systems, and adjusts several existing ships, items, and missions. Galactic Scourge involves many non-linear plots and give the pilot an opportunity to quickly earn privileges with the Confeds, Rebels, and Pirates. One can go rich and powerful or cause the destruction of the known universe. Updates and more information can be found at http://www.geocities.com/ev_scourge/. Correspondence to maxb@nono.com.

719.title: EV Mission Workbooks
719.author: Anonymous
719.description: This document can serve as a checklist to keep track of the EV missions you have completed. It contains a full list of all the storylines you can complete in EV. Includes information on where to find each mission, the ranking and combat rating you need, and other important information. In Microsoft Excel and Appleworks formats.

726.title: EVUpgradeGuide.sit
726.author: Anonymous
726.description: This guide contains exhaustive information on every upgrade you can add to your ship in EV.  In addition to the excellent and useful compilation of statistics and information, each upgrade page contains a picture of the item, as well as the author's take on how useful the upgrade is.  Highly recommended.

720.title: EVAtlas10b2.sit
720.author: Anonymous
720.description: This set of 10 PICT files contain maps of the Escape Velocity galaxy, depicting different types of data: Equipment Prices, Industrial Prices, Luxuries Prices, Medical Prices, Metal Prices, Navigation Hazards, Spaceport Facilities, Political Map, Food Prices, Screen Map. HIGHLY useful maps and data.

883.title: FFB2.sit
883.author: Anonymous
883.description:
The long-awaited update to
   the early EV classic. Sixteen new ships, countless new outfits,
   and at least eighty new missions. Expanded Read-Me also. "One of
   these days they'll be your masters they'll do what it takes,
   they're full-fledged bastards."

3368.title: Flying High 1.5
3368.author: James Hoffman
3368.description: Flying High is always under continuous development, because indeed, no plug-in is perfect!

3436.title: Flying High 2.1
3436.author: James Hoffman
3436.description: The version of Flying High where everything works the way it\'s supposed to work.  :)   Play five long strings of missions with tons of excitement; use all kinds of different weapons, each with their own unique traits; improve your ships with theoretically limitless little outfits that will be lots of fun; same old galaxy, though.  :P   But you\'ll like it!  Try it out!

716.title: EV strategy guide
716.author: Anonymous
716.description: In my early EV days, I searched for a strategy guide that didn't give everything away, but told me a few hints without making everything way too easy or using strategies that took days.  Now, I decided to write one.  It includes strategies on how to fight, how to make money, and most importantly, how to use your skill to improve your succes.

1074.title: talon18.sit
1074.author: Anonymous
1074.description: As the Civil War rages on, independent small traders and corporations became tired of being caught in the middle of battles not their own, and having no protection from the ever-increasing pirate attacks. A number of them came together and formed an organisation under the name Talon to try to preserve the safety of those not taking part in the war.

3446.title: Flying High 3.0
3446.author: James Hoffman
3446.description:
I have been doing some hard work to fix up the little errors that appear here and there in the plug, and to be sure that every ship has its purpose, that everything is balanced.

In Flying High 3.0, play four major strings of up to 35 missions each, an introductory string for the Militia of 10 missions, and an extra string if you can find it.  The game is hopefully witty, challenging, and engaging.  Lots of ships to choose from, weapons to fire, and upgrades to do, and the missions will keep everyone occupied for a good chunk of time.  And if this is not enough, there\'s plenty of fleets and special vessels flying around begging to be challenged by a valiant captain!

Do please enjoy the plug-in, and tell me what you think of it!

1011.title: RealmOfPrey
1011.author: Anonymous
1011.description: REALM OF PREY (version 1.0)  [ATTENTION: This is a recompressed version as the previous file posted here had apparently been badly corrupted in transit]  This is my first new TC since "Heart Of Darkness" and takes place in a universe that is very different from that of the Empire Trilogy. This tale is set in a galaxy administered by the benevolent Earth Confederacy which, after decades of successful expansion, has evolved into little more than an anachronism that is beginning to crumble and fall apart at the seams.  True galactic power lies in the form of powerful pirate guilds, expansionist transgalactic megacorporations and a mysterious xenophobic splinter faction.  The plug boasts a whopping 220 original missions, 65 new weapons and outfits, over 100 brand new worlds and systems to explore, 54 new and altered ships and is a showcase of the impressive ship designs (many exclusively made for this plug) of Nick "Shade" Williams.  The author can be contacted at islest@tnet.net or through his homepage at www.geocities.com/empire_trilogy.

725.title: EVShipGuideII.sit
725.author: Anonymous
725.description:
Thanks for downloading the offical unofficial Escape Velocity Ship Guide.  I'm sure it will prove to be useful.  Also look for the Escape Velocity Upgrades Guide.  Featuring pictures and plenty of statisitcs, the Upgrades Guide also gives you pointers about upgrades as well as where you can purchase the upgrade.

If you have any comments/questions/corrections feel free to email me at: MasterM4@aol.com.

974.title: newhorizons.sit
974.author: Anonymous
974.description: The galaxy is awaiting- Sociology and technology are never stagnant. Even on a galactic scale they change with time. Over the years the civil war has worn down the Confederation through isolation and hit and run tactics. The once mighty Confederation fleet is falling to the ravages of disrepair and a sad lack of new technology.The isolation imposed by the rebel encirclement has cut off the Confederation from the best scientists and tacticians. This formerly terrible and powerful government is dying. It is only a matter of time before it falls. The pirates have not been idle.Despite the efforts of the Artemis group, some pirate factions banded together into a powerful crime syndicate that has warships and the best underground network in the galaxy. ...And there is something hiding in the Enigma Nebula... Weighing in at 25 MB unstuffed, this add-on, created by Aidan Hotan, is far bigger and more complex than everything previously released, including but not limited to Escape Velocity: Override by Ambrosia Software. And the best part: IT'S FREE!

988.title: Pale1.9.sit
988.author: Anonymous
988.description:
The Civil War continues as a reluctant new political player is thrust into intergalactic politics. An independent world determined to maintain its identity engages in astro-physical research of areas beyond the Fringe. The Lethe-Cydonian War hurtles toward its conclusion. And Hunter, having reasserted its clannish consciousness following the devastation of its homeworld, Orion, in the Great War, quietly re-industrializes, but at what cost to the colonized worlds and humanity?
Pale is a plug-in for Escape Velocity that further develops the EV universe. Its singular emphasis is quality. Pale offers many new systems many new ships and outfits, all with stunning graphics over 140 missions and a complex plot line incorporating five major mission sets.
Think you might be interested in playing? Click on the download link.

780.title: BrotherhoodOfTheKestrel
780.author: Anonymous
780.description: BROTHERHOOD OF THE KESTREL (version 1.0) This much anticipated follow-up to the popular EMPIRE OF CRIME also takes place during the savage conflict between the hegemony of the Terran Star Empire and the rebellious Weave Alliance. Fighting has reached a critical point with either side poised for victory, though as manpower and resources are increasingly redirected to the front lines, organised crime has achieved unprecedented power in the absence of any serious law enforcement. Tiring of the increasingly dangerous life of a Consolidated Express bridge officer, you have resigned your commission and left the world of legitimate business behind to forge your own path to wealth and glory. The game thus charts the exploits of three of the galaxy's most dangerous pirate guilds: the savage and homocidal band of assassins and cutthroats that make up the Darkside Faction the ruthless Sauridian criminal juggernaut known as the K'rali Syndicate and master pirate Carl Warrington's devious Subnebula Cartel. Big guns, bad attitudes, hidden agendas and twice the action of the original conspire to make this an absolute must-have for the hardcore player. The plug boasts scores of new systems and planets to explore, devastating new faction specific warships and weaponry and many new and altered ships, including several formidable bosses. There are THREE different character driven storylines in 220 brand new, original missions that feature numerous interacting personalities and factions. WARNING: MATURE PLAYERS ONLY. This game contains graphic descriptive violence, profanity and adult themes that some may find offensive. The plug was compressed using DropStuff 6.0 and the author can be contacted via www.evula.org/empire_trilogy.

784.title: ClaviusAndBeyond32s.sit
784.author: Anonymous
784.description: Fight against a pro-Confed extremist movement and use new weapons, beat off an alien invasion, discover an ancient civilization... Land on Clavius Station, and depending on your combat skills, you will be able to pilot the famous Neutronic Kestrel Interceptor, a sleek, fast and powerful vessel. Just go to Clavius Station and the adventure will start... Dogfights, powerful ships, terrifying weapons and... love: Clavius and Beyond contains all a space adventurer wants from life! Also available, Clavius and Beyond Hints (6k).

840.title: EV Game Expander 1.0u2.sit
840.author: Anonymous
840.description: (EVGE Second Update) Here is an all new scenario that I have put together for the game Escape Velocity. It does not completely change the game environment, but expands the existing one greatly. The Confeds and Rebels are still there, but they've got company. Two new galactic super-powers have found their way into the game, the Orion Union (confed-friendly) and the Polaris Alliance (confed-haters, thus Rebel-friendly). Some smaller local governments are also added to the EV universe. To offer more playing space, lots of new systems and stellar objects have been added, as well as tons of new ships and outfits. To make trading a little more exciting, lots of new trading-items, organized in a complex web of trade-routes, has also been added. If  you figure them out, you may find a quick way to wealth. Some new missions have also been added, not as many as I would have liked, but that may come as an add-on later.

938.title: lightningjump.sit
938.author: Anonymous
938.description:
Lightning Jump is a simple utility-type plug-in for either Escape Velocity or EV Override.  This small but useful goodie physically speeds up your hyperjumps so that you're in the next system by the time your finger lifts off the 'J' key.  This does not affect time in the game clock.

This package includes both the EV and EVO versions of the plug-in.

723.title: EVPoliticalMap102.sit
723.author: Anonymous
723.description:
This full-color (QuickDraw 32) PICT file contains a map of the Escape Velocity galaxy.

Star system symbols (usually just a colored circle) show the controlling government.
Star system names include the names of the objects in the system, in order (e.g., in the Propus system, New Scotland is listed second so type 2 to select it for landing or hailing).
Names of objects are grayed out if you cant land on them. Note that there are objects without facilities on which you can land these still have names in black.
Star system coordinates were taken from the EV Data 1.0.2 file and the background is white for printing.

792.title: ConEx12.sit
792.author: Anonymous
792.description: ConEx 1.2 fixes all the bugs in ConEx 1.1, and gives the ship Dart a sleeker new look! It is equiped with 10 all new ships for the government called Consolidated Express, which is now 11 systems strong. Let the 35 new missions make you travel throught the galaxy with a set of linked missions, teaching you how to fly. Be sure to land on Conex, Exeon, and Cenron, their backgrounds will amaze you. (ConEx 1.1 - 1.2 updater.)

958.title: Mugabi and Destiny.sit
958.author: Anonymous
958.description:
Mugabi And Destiny begins where the Alien storylines in Escape Velocity conclude.  
     Following your fabulous success against the Alien Cruiser menace, you search for new adventure, and answers to the mysteries of your past. You will see things you have never seen, and do things you did not think possible. Mutiny, romance, death, sacrifice, suicide, irony, mystery, and destiny await you in an epic whirlwind adventure.
     There are changes to virtually every aspect of Escape Velocity, but Mugabi And Destiny is designed to move along quickly and concisely. It also features music, and the most impressive space objects and landing pictures ever to appear in EV. 
     Expect the unexpected. 
     The answer is out there, Captain.
Version 2.0, created by Gandalf (mkloppers@shaw.ca).
Visit the new Mugabi and Destiny Website to preview the features, view the credits and links, and use the support page.
http://members.shaw.ca/Gandalf_Mugabi

959.title: Mugabi and Destiny her.sit
959.author: Anonymous
959.description:
Mugabi And Destiny... for her  begins where the Alien storylines in Escape Velocity conclude.  
     Following your fabulous success against the Alien Cruiser menace, you search for new adventure, and answers to the mysteries of your past. You will see things you have never seen, and do things you did not think possible. Mutiny, romance, death, sacrifice, suicide, irony, mystery, and destiny await you in an epic whirlwind adventure.
     There are changes to virtually every aspect of Escape Velocity, but Mugabi And Destiny... for her  is designed to move along quickly and concisely. It also features music, and the most impressive space objects and landing pictures ever to appear in EV. 
     Expect the unexpected. 
     The answer is out there, Captain.
Version 2.0, created by Gandalf (mkloppers@shaw.ca).
Visit the new Mugabi and Destiny... for her  Website to preview the features, view the credits and links, and use the support page.
http://members.shaw.ca/Gandalf_Mugabi_her

1086.title: The Weaponator
1086.author: Anonymous
1086.description: This makes a weapon thats as cheap as a coke and as heavy as a pepsi and as powerful as a machine gun

718.title: EV Bible
718.author: Anonymous
718.description: This is version 1.0 of EV Bible.  EV Bible is a program for plugin developers that organizes and stores the EV bibles for both EV Override (which pertains to EV orginal as well) and EVN.  This application was coded by Alan Smith (cheers) and UI was designed by Robert Friedland (me).  This application has been tested and is very stable.  Runs on OSX 10.3.9 and OSX 10.4 Tiger.  It may work on earlier OSX versions and is PowerPC only.  Version 2.0 will have many more features and updates are still to come.  Check this website: http://www.youtellme.meadowsweetfarm.com/index.htm for updates, news, and a full description with screenshots on this application.  Questions, comments, suggestions?  Send me an e-mail at trinix@sbcglobal.net.  Thanks.

943.title: Mach.sit
943.author: Anonymous
943.description: This is version 1.0 of Mach, a new plug-in for EV. Currently, it adds 6 systems that can be found connected to Darven. These systems are filled with Pirates, each one harder than the last. Mach 6 even includes 3 new ships- the Pirate Fighter, Destroyer, and Crusier. Version 2 will feature missions and a more in-depth story behind Mach, and new comm and target graphics for the new ships. Created by Benjamin.

3398.title: Flying High 1.7
3398.author: James Hoffman
3398.description:
Flying High is a plug-in that will give the player a hard time.  The player may also have an easy time, but even the easiest of times can quickly go sour.  The comps are well-equipped to fight you in even the most powerful of vessels.

Four massive mission strings to play, plenty of side-missions, and lots of secrets to discover.

Have fun!

829.title: EmpireOfCrime
829.author: Anonymous
829.description: EMPIRE OF CRIME (version 1.0)  The war between the rebellious Weave Alliance and the hegemony of the Terran Star Empire has reached a critical point, with either side poised for victory.  However, as resources are increasingly seconded to the front lines, the only true victor has been intergalactic organised crime, which has profited and risen to infamy in the absence of any real law enforcement.  Tiring of the increasingly dangerous life of a merchant trader, you decide to abandon the world of legitimate business and forge your own path to glory.  The game can be played from the viewpoint of three very different perspectives: an association with the upstart Serpens Triumvirate the thankless task of an intergalactic bounty hunter, or an allegiance with the mysterious Mafia. This will be a galaxy in which you will have a multitude of enemies and precious few friends... though who can you really trust, for in a time of near anarchy and golden opportunity, friendship and comradery are the rarest of all commodities.  This plug offers more than 200 original missions, a multitude of new weapons and outfits, over 100 new worlds and systems and more than 40 new and altered ships, including seven formidable "bosses".  Indeed, this plug-in should prove to be an absolute must-have for the 'hardcore' EV player.  The author can be contacted at islest@tnet.net and don't forget to check the official homepage of the http://www.geocities.com/empire_trilogy/. If you are having download problems, check the Empire Trilogy homepage.

823.title: E3-ENDGAME.sit
823.author: Anonymous
823.description: (version 1.0) In this scenario, the malevolent Terran Star Empire has been completely defeated by the Weave Alliance. After literally decades of war the galaxy is finally at peace, but all is not what it seems as new regional powers, revenge-minded factions and an unspeakable evil emerge. You can fly for the Weave Alliance, the Sauridian Freehold or a shadowy group known as The Scavengers, all of whom offer challenging, interactive storylines. The plug-in contains no less than 220 new missions in three major suites, five active new governments, 72 new weapons and outfits, 145 unique new stellars, 175 new systems and 58 new and altered ships, most of which are faction-specific. As usual, the package comes complete with an illustrated stand-alone ReadMe and a useful FAQ.

913.title: HeartOfDarkness.sit
913.author: Anonymous
913.description: HEART OF DARKNESS (version 1.0)  This is the "grand finale" to the Empire Trilogy, whose previous episodes included Empire, E2: Dark Horizons, E3: Endgame and Empire of Crime.  In this instalment, the oppressive Terran Star Empire controls the galaxy with an iron fist.  Forced into retreat, surrounded and fighting for its very survival, the rebellious Weave Alliance has been quietly establishing relations with the Saa'rel Union, a pacifist society of remarkable technological prowess.  Efforts are being made by The Weave to convince the Saa'rellians of the very real danger posed by Empire annexation, and perhaps gain a much needed ally in return.  Realising the possible threat of any such union and encouraged by the discovery of a mysterious artifact, the Empire's dark agents are secretly attempting to make first contact with a mythical, ancient race of unimaginable power with the intention of forming an alliance of its own, thus countering any possible future Weave insurgency.  However, little does the Empire's fanatical Central Command realise what they are about to unleash on an unsuspecting - and unprepared - universe.  This plug-in offers 62 unique new outfits,48 new and altered ships, with 3 powerful "bosses" and 2 deadly sentinels, 70 new systems and 75 new stellars to explore and two decidedly different character storylines to play via 220 original, well written missions.  The author can be reached at islest@tnet.net and the official homepage is at http://www.geocities.com/empire_trilogy.

1018.title: RebelEscortCarrier1.0.1.sea
1018.author: Anonymous
1018.description:
Changes the coloured bands on the Escort Carrier to red, makes the Escort Carrier available for purchase after the Rebel Alien mission (if you want if for some reason), adds the Escort Carrier to the normal game (2 düdes and 1 flët), adds a few përs Escort Carriers. All additions are regardless of Confederate Escort Carrier missions. 
Captain Thomas 1.0.1 Fixed special tech so it can actually be bought, apologies.

866.title: evmagma10.sit
866.author: Anonymous
866.description: EV : MAGMA is the Escape Velocity version of the very popular (read : over 15,000 downloads) EVO : MAGMA.  MAGMA (Maximum Audio / Graphical Metamorphosis Addition) breaths new life into the game by re-doing Escape Velocity's graphics and sounds - they're now realistic. Want to find out more? (You know you do.) Check out screenshots at the site:  www.meowx.com/magma

820.title: E2-DARK HORIZONS.sit
820.author: Anonymous
820.description: (version 1.0) This is a truly massive sequel to the plug-in EMPIRE, which centered on a ragtag group of alien sentients who formed an alliance to fight off domination by the evil Terran Star Empire. E2:DH takes place several years following an Empire victory, during which the Weave Alliance appears to have been completely destroyed. In this game you can fly for the oppressive Empire, the rebellious Alliance or join forces with the coolest pirate ever. There are also no less than five minor factions with their own exclusive mission suites to keep you busy! There are 10 active new governments, 32 new stellars (with dozens more modified), 70 new systems, 50 weapons/outfits to choose from, 55+ new/mod ships, and no less than 190+ original new missions - many of which are exceptionally challenging. The plug-in comes complete with both a useful FAQ and an extended stand-alone document which provides much greater details as to the continuing storyline and Factions, in addition to useful data regarding the available ships and tech. You should also download the version 1.0 -- 1.2 updater, a very small patch that repairs some minor bugs. Once again, credit to Ace McCloud for bringing this to my attention.

986.title: Oreste 4.1.sea
986.author: Anonymous
986.description:
This plug-in has been written for those who have completed the missions of Escape Velocity and want to get a new world, with new ships, weapons, graphics and missions.
Generally you meet tougher opponents when completing the missions, and more ships and weapons become available.
You can side with the Confederation, the Rebellion, the Pirates or the Kr'Wgh. You won't get the same rewards (ships/weapons).
Confederation: you will help the civilized Confederation to destroy the infamous Rebellion-Aliens coalition, who threats the whole Mankind. Will the Confederation be stronger than this coalition ?
Rebellion: you will help the Rebellion to destroy the totalitarian Confederation, and make the Galaxy free with the help of alien technology. But why are the Aliens helping the Rebellion ?
Pirate: do you feel really evil, and want to make a living as a Pirate ? If you work well for Pirates, they can reward you well. But is Nar Akasi, the Pirate leader, sending you to suicide missions, or has he lost all sense of reality ?
The Kr'Wgh: a new sort of aliens, not very friendly with humans, found beyond Olympus (South-West corner of the galaxy). You will learn who they are, where they live, and what they expect in life.

821.title: E2updater.sit
821.author: Anonymous
821.description: This is a very small patch to E2-DARK HORIZONS that repairs some minor bugs. Once again, credit to Ace McCloud for bringing this to my attention.

1098.title: TurinVPatch.sit
1098.author: Anonymous
1098.description:
Turin V Patch By Far World Software / Brian Whalley  Turin V Patch is a small plugin that fixes one of the more annoying elements of EV's scenario.  It will stay dormant untill the player finishes the Turin V terraforming missions.  At that time, the planet will appear to have been terraformed into a more hospitable world, and the 'Defend Turin V' mission, which normally occurs multiple times, will remain available.   

If you encounter any problems with this file, a bug fix has been released at http://prophet.damnsw.net/fws/turinvpatch.sit.hqx .

881.title: EyeOfOrion13.sit
881.author: Anonymous
881.description: Indiana Jones meets EV! Episodic campaign pack which includes new ships, worlds, systems, graphics, sounds, missions etc evil mummies, ancient tombs, mystic curses, grave robbers, black marketeers, malign murders, arcane artifacts, mysterious suicides, academia (yipes!) and more...leading to an epic confrontation with a resurrected evil that threatens to wipe out the galaxy! Are you brave enough to try to stop it?

674.title: EVMaxCheater.sit
674.author: Anonymous
674.description: EV Max Cheater is "almost" just like any other cheater, everything costs 1 credit (even the commodities), all weapons and outfits weigh nothing, and all the ships can get lots of stuff. But EV Max Cheater is different, it has ALL the graphics in place! No more green Xs for pictures! Now you can get nice graphics for them! I hope you enjoy this excellent cheater! Have Fun!

828.title: Empire.sea
828.author: Anonymous
828.description: This plug-in centers on the conflict between the oppressive Terran Star Empire and a ragtag group of aliens who have formed a temporary alliance to fight off Empire domination. You can fly for these rebels, the Star Empire or even organised crime if you prefer. There are 30 new ships, 48 new weapons and outfits and about 100 new missions, many of which are quite challenging. The plug-in comes complete with an extended stand-alone document which provides greater in-depth detail as to the storyline and factions.

835.title: Era-A
835.author: Anonymous
835.description:
This is a alpha of the probably ill-fated Era plugin, with fantastic graphics done by Thomas Wiley.  There is a slight chance I will finish it if I can get some new graphics from Jeb Smith (pale artist and ex. Jag Werks owner), but otherwise you'll have just what I've got done here.

This plugin has 30+ new great looking ships, 20+ weapons, and would have had numerous new systems and missions, but the mission count right now is only at 20, and those are just for the Barsex Government, which is the only path I've started working on.  To access the missions, you must have completed the rebel alien mission, and you receive the first one at scorpio.  This alpha should still keep you busy for a little bit, mail comments to douglas.black@usa.net.  It's worth the download, enjoy.

724.title: EVShipGuide.sit
724.author: Anonymous
724.description: This application contains all of the stats for the ships in Ambrosia's Escape Velocity including all ships that are not purchasable from planets.  This guide is for reference purposes so you can compare ships and decide which ones you want (or just to look at for fun).  Ships are arranged in order of cost except for the Rebel, Confederate, and Alien ships, which are seperated from the others.  Ship names are the full long names.  Names in parentheseds are the normal, shortened names.

1029.title: saab10
1029.author: Anonymous
1029.description:
Hey kids! Remember the old Fox SciFi action series, Space: Above and Beyond? Well, now Meowx, in combination with the wildly popular EV MAGMA addon, brings to you the pinnacle of space fightercraft, the SA-43 Hammerhead, straight from the twenty-first-and-a-half century. 
This plug adds only two ships and two outfits to the original EV universe: the Hammerhead, the Carl S. Vincent class space carrier vehicle, the purchaseable Hammerhead bay, and the Hammerhead fighter outfit.
[DISCLAIMER: For Escape Velocity with EV MAGMA only.]

744.title: AngelsOfVengeance.sit
744.author: Anonymous
744.description: Beer, blues, bulbous-headed aliens and babes: This plug-in has em all. Over 50 new missions, two new opposing governments, several new ships and weapons with unique 3d graphics. Two seperate plots, each with its own shocking conclusion!

886.title: finalbattle41
886.author: Anonymous
886.description:
Final Battle expands EV and allows you to see the Rebel-Confed conflict through to its resolution. Be
        forwarned: when you have crushed the opposition, the battle has only begun.

714.title: ZeroTech.sit
714.author: Anonymous
714.description:
This plug-in will lower all tech-levels to zero so you can buy all the ships and weapons everywhere in the universe. If you get any problems email me:
zupmah_jidder@hotmail.com

This is one of my first plug-ins.

918.title: HostileTakeover1.sit
918.author: Anonymous
918.description: Hostile Take-over is a largish plug-in for EV 1.0.5. It adds 15 new ships, 9 new weapons, 6 new outfits, 11 new or modified governments, 6+ modified systems, 2 modified landing picts, several new or modified dudes and fleets, and a whole mess o' missions - most with a connecting storyline. You can join the ranks of MegaSoft Interstellar and help lead them to a bright future or... not.

984.title: omegafaction1.01.sit
984.author: Anonymous
984.description: As the war raged on between the Confederacy and the Rebellion, many systems soon grew alienated by the constant fighting and pressure to take sides.  These systems chose to remain as independant, autonomous systems without alleigences to either side.  However, in the wake of the constant attention by the Confeds and Rebels to each other, the Pirates soon grew very powerful and began to prey on independant merchants and systems.  With nowhere to turn for assistence and no organized resistence to the Pirates, many independant systems faced a hopeless future of living in fear of the Pirates menace.

1052.title: Star Wars-ANA 68k
1052.author: Anonymous
1052.description:
68K Version -- A long time ago, in a galaxy far ,far away...

It is a time of great turmoil in the galaxy . The Emperor is gone, defeated at the Battle of Endor, but the
Imperial Fleet lives on to continue his legacy of tyranny. The Empire, massing its mighty forces at the center of the galaxy, is ready to shatter the Rebellion, and regain its past glory. A new DEATH STAR nears
completion, and the Empire prepares for the coming war...

Meanwhile... The outer planets report the possibility of a new and greater threat to the universe that even the DEATH STAR itself may not be powerful enough to stop. Who knows how long until the New Alliance
must face this new enemy...

Good luck, Captain, and may the Force be with you...

1059.title: starwarsdeathstar.sit
1059.author: Anonymous
1059.description: This is a very cool, very large graphic to supplement the plugin Star Wars along with some cool new X-Wing graphics. However, make sure you have a lot of RAM.

1053.title: Star Wars-ANA PPC
1053.author: Anonymous
1053.description:
PowerPC Version -- A long time ago, in a galaxy far ,far away...

It is a time of great turmoil in the galaxy . The Emperor is gone, defeated at the Battle of Endor, but the
Imperial Fleet lives on to continue his legacy of tyranny. The Empire, massing its mighty forces at the center of the galaxy, is ready to shatter the Rebellion, and regain its past glory. A new DEATH STAR nears
completion, and the Empire prepares for the coming war...

Meanwhile... The outer planets report the possibility of a new and greater threat to the universe that even the DEATH STAR itself may not be powerful enough to stop. Who knows how long until the New Alliance
must face this new enemy...

Good luck, Captain, and may the Force be with you...

671.title: EV SUPER Helper v2
671.author: Anonymous
671.description: Updated form of EV SUPER Helper v1.0 all outfits are weightless, you can buy 999 max and are all 1 credit, all ships are availible for 1 credit, and last but not least... the hyperspace distance mod. actually works!

1078.title: Terran Rebellion 1.1
1078.author: Anonymous
1078.description: A whole new add-on and a new way to look at Escape Velocity!  A new galaxy to explore, new governments, a new mission, new outfits, and new or modified ships.  This add-on is similar to my Alien Empire except that it is in a whole new galaxy!  This is only the second version though, so It doesn't have all the missions, ships, outfits, or systems that it will have, and with that thought I want you to tell me what errors you find.  Email me at wouties@mac.com

837.title: EV AI Upgrade .sit
837.author: Anonymous
837.description: This plug-in upgrades the Ship AI to EVO 1.0.2's AI. This makes the game much more challenging. The first thing is the fighters behave differently. They will pull off a few different manuvers on you and just be a lot smarter in general. Just prior to the release to EVO 1.0.2, on the EVO Webboard, I heard one of the Beta Testers someone report on the improved AI. They said that they were flying a Crecent Warship (Kestral), and they were caught off-guard and destroyed by 5 Kraits (defenders with the speed of a Rapier). The other major thing was the ships were programmed to recognise the Monty Python, and they won't fall for it as easily. It's still possible, but you have to have a lot more skill to pull it off than you did before. Please note that this may affect other parts of the game, but proably not in a negitive way. This plug-in is compatable with all EV plug-ins, TC or non-TC, Even if the other plug-in's read me says that it is compatable with no other plug-ins. The only concievable plug-in this would be incompatable with would be one that did the same thing.

1051.title: ST, The Plug In .55b1
1051.author: Anonymous
1051.description:
This is a star trek plug-in that I sent in years ago, but never had a reply on.  please tell me if you get it and if it will be posted.  thanks.

Wes Hutchison
chronos1701@yahoo.com

666.title: E3modifier
666.author: Anonymous
666.description:
Empire 3: Endgame version 1.0 Ship Modifier -- 

This is NOT a bug repair or version update, but rather a tool for those players having difficulty surviving certain mission 'sentinel' battlestations.  It lowers their shield strength slightly and dramatically increases their shield recharge rates, making them more vulnerable.  To use, simply place the enclosed update in the same Plug-ins folder as Empire 3: Endgame.  You do not need to start a new pilot file, as the only thing changed are certain ship characteristics.

690.title: Mega Cheater.sit
690.author: Anonymous
690.description:
This is Mega Cheater.  All Outfits are weightless and cost nothing.  All Ships are FREE.
the gunboat for the gunboat bay is fixed and so are all the alien weapons.  And anywhere there
is a outfit or ship yard you can buy anything you want.

703.title: Sir Cheatalot.sit
703.author: Anonymous
703.description: Hey, you cheaters out there, ready for a new way to cheat? Sir Cheatalot adds lots of cheat missions. Just accept 'em and go to Levo and then you'll get lots of money, or items not normally available in the game. rmbmueller@compuserve.com

729.title: SpacersGuide.sit
729.author: Anonymous
729.description: This is the equivalent of a tourbook of the Escape Velocity galaxy it gives the data on all the star systems and objects. It is based on the HyperCard 2.3 engine but does not require HyperCard to run (it is a self-contained application).

747.title: ArcTCo110.sit
747.author: Anonymous
747.description: An ion storm deposits you in an alternate EV universe where three new governments, and many new planets, ships, outfits and missions are woven together into an ingenious plot that can be played out from three sides to two different endings.

759.title: azertykeyboard.sit
759.author: Anonymous
759.description: Lets EV 1.0.2 (or later) support AZERTY keyboards (i.e keyboards used in France and, probably, some other French speaking countries). Simply drop it in the EV Plug-ins folder.

782.title: BVGraphicsAddOn.sit
782.author: Anonymous
782.description: BV Graphics add-on allows to see the graphics of Battle Velocity 3.0 when actually playing the classic Escape Velocity or other plug-ins.

787.title: CleanRecordv10.sit
787.author: Anonymous
787.description: This plugin adds a single outfit, the False Transponder, which is a cheaper version of the false ID papers.

819.title: E1updater.sit
819.author: Anonymous
819.description: This is a simple update to E1-WAR WITHOUT END that repairs a problem with the Empire storyline that causes a certain fleet not to appear at a pivotal battle. If you are having problems with the mission "No Turning Back", simply install this update in the plugin folder. Thanks to Ace McCloud for pointing this out.

872.title: EVPlus.sit
872.author: Anonymous
872.description: EV Plus 1.0 is a plug-in that adds ONE HUNDRED new AI personalities to the original Escape Velocity! It is designed for people who want to expand the EV universe, without altering the basics. Its easy. Its incredibly cool. And will probably work with most other simple plug-ins! Now all you have to do is play EV with EV Plus 1.0, and wait for the next version! In which, I plan to add at least FIFTY more AI pers, new missions that don't interfere with the original storyline, and also, some cool missions you can get FROM the new pers!

911.title: GSto145
911.author: Anonymous
911.description: Update your copy of Galactic Scourge 1.3 or 1.4.x to version 1.4.5.  More information can be found at http://www.geocities.com/ev_scourge/. Correspondence to maxb@nono.com.

1000.title: PilotUtilityPack.sit
1000.author: Anonymous
1000.description:
Përsonal Flyer:
If you create a pilot while this plug is active, you should be able to use the same pilot in most other plugs.  (Note: The plugin doesn't have to stay in your plugin folder all the time, only when making new pilots).

Ajax  Pilot:  This will clear the mission bits of any pilot, making it posible to use the same pilot in two different plugs.  Simply put the plug in the plugins folder, land at the nearest inhabbited planet, look in the mission computer, and get as many of the "Clear Bit" or "Clear Bits" missions as possible.  Only the ones you need will show up.  Then take off and land at the same planet.  Repeat as needed. -)

1043.title: spacerocks1.0.sit
1043.author: Anonymous
1043.description: This plugin replaces all the original planets and asteroids graphics with some ones that we created. Developed using Alias and SGI. Check it out!

1079.title: Terran Rebellion 2.0
1079.author: Anonymous
1079.description: This is truely a whole new way to look at EV.  This one can support that statement unlike my last Terran Rebellion I put out, because this one has a whole new interface and new ships and better governments(you don't get into trouble by one if you shoot a non ally) and there are different ship graphics, like I used confed ships for terrans and used 2 evo ships for the alien alliance.  It has one starter mission and will have more soon. If you have comments or suggestions, please email me at wouties@earthlink.net.

1114.title: Weapon-plug
1114.author: Anonymous
1114.description:
This plug is complete now, is has all outfits and ships availble .
It has an new look for EV one you might say this looks like hell to me.
But wait if someone can send me a file about EV misions, I want to make misions on my own.
So if someone can tell me how i work with EV Edit 2.3 Let me know please he and check the read me file Thanks dohholland@hotmail.com

1161.title: PlugMaker
1161.author: Anonymous
1161.description: Tired of opening Resedit and going through the trouble of remembering and typing EV's codes to make a plug?  With this you can have a plugin made in 3 clicks.  Easy enough, right?

961.title: Mysterious Force
961.author: Anonymous
961.description: I made this plugin for my younger brother who plays EV.  It adds two outfits to the Palshife outfitting, a Corvette Bay, and a Power Beam, which is a cross of the Particle Beam and Tractor Beam.  Also, to remind my bro who's in charge, I added a special character who uses my dream ship in the game.  If you ever see him in action, you will not forget it.  Just keep your eye out for the Mysterious Supreme Force!

749.title: arena.sit
749.author: Anonymous
749.description: Arena is a battle simulator for EV. Start with a Hawk and work your way up through the ranks by fighting ships you select to fight in the Arena. Difficult in my opinion, so it should be a challenge for experienced players.

885.title: Final Battle
885.author: Anonymous
885.description:
Final Battle expands EV and allows you to see the Rebel-Confed conflict through to its resolution. Be forwarned: when you have crushed the opposition, the battle has only begun. Version 4.0.

This file should work better than the old one if not, I have no clue why. -EVula

1032.title: Satori Station
1032.author: Anonymous
1032.description:
The Rebel Special Operations Force, also known as the R.S.O.F, is an organization of Rebel officers and mercenaries created to take on missions deemed too time-consuming or "dirty" for the Rebel Navy. Although often criticized for taking extreme measures, they have always been sucessful. Now they need your help...
Satori Station adds 17 new missions to the Rebel string, which add many new ships and stellars to the EV universe.

739.title: Alpha Console.sit
739.author: Anonymous
739.description: Alpha Console© v1.0 brings a fresh, new, younger look to EV that won't fail to impress. There's a new options screen, the in game side panel has a fantastic new look, the like of which has not yet been seen, new target graphics, and all the in-game menu buttons have changed.

1057.title: starwars2.01.sit
1057.author: Anonymous
1057.description: This version features 17+ accurately 3D rendered Star Wars ships, weapons, sounds, planets, graphics and people and two more new ships.

760.title: Babylon5
760.author: Anonymous
760.description: The B5 plug-in adds 24+ systems, 24 missions, 14 ships, 8 govts, 40 outfits, almost 24 sounds to EV, and the ability for several systems to CHANGE GOVERNMENTS depending on the outcome of some missions! Core missions begin at the start of Babylon 5s 3rd season.

713.title: Who Wants to be a Billionaire?
713.author: Anonymous
713.description: This useful plug-in multiplies the payment for almost any EV mission by 1,000!  What was once a meager 10,000 credit cargo mission now pays 10 million!  A must have for impatient or cheating people.

731.title: Velociteers Guide
731.author: Anonymous
731.description: Greetings, I am Captain Rusty Ironworks, and I have written this guide to help the beginning space traveler so that he (or she) does not have to endure the hardships and strife that I had to survive when I started working the space lines.  To start out, I have compiled a list of all the ships and the descriptions that are written next to the picture in the Shipyard.  I will write my views on the ships in italicized blue writing below the description.

921.title: InherentGovt1.sit
921.author: Anonymous
921.description: This small plug changes the inherent governments of the ships in EV. This means Confeds won't automaticlly attack ANY Rebel ship. (although they will still attack Rebel governed ships). No longer will you have to put up with annoying Confeds constantly attacking you simply because you're in a Rebel ship. Now, if you're a convicted criminal, that's a different story....

926.title: Josie Maran.sit
926.author: Anonymous
926.description:
2/9/02
Nebula

This plugin is a fun plugin for Escape Velocity dedicated to super model Josie Maran that I created in my spare time. It introduces 1 new planet, 3 new ships and some interesting fun in the Levo system!!!

721.title: EVMap.sit
721.author: Anonymous
721.description: Another map of the EV universe -- this one includes a handy vector-based map that is meant for printing.  Nice to have as a reference.

762.title: Battle Front
762.author: Anonymous
762.description: This is a plug that I decided not to finish this adds 9 ships (the graphics were not made by me and I changed the names of a few), the ships put in are well known ones like the Rebel Escort Carrier wich can be bought after completing the Rebels Alien missions. It adds 28 missions, it includes missions for the pirates and many other governments. You can help destroy a planet on one of the missions. Their are 20 personalities and edits 3. There are four new stellars and it edits 6 of them. 2 new governments are intorduced and 4 are edited, their are six new outfits like super powerful yet fuel hungry lasers, and you can buy onboard computers which can do certain things. 9 Dude types are made and 1 is edited. If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions than email me at kc3@gdnmail.net (if you have emailed me for any other plugs at kc3@amen.net and I have not replied than email me at kc3@gdnamil.net)

795.title: Cool Ships are Added  NE
795.author: Anonymous
795.description:
This plug adds four new ships cool ships.  read the READ ME to find out what they are.  It is not a cheat.  Just a plug.  Enjoy!


By:  Red Dragon

813.title: DestroyerWars5.2
813.author: Anonymous
813.description: This Destroyer Wars is better graphicaly inclined.  The systems only send out one ship now and the ship is more powerful than it used to be.  E-mail me if you want me to change something.  My E-mail address is wouties@mac.com.  Please at all costs read the read me.  Have a great fight!!!

955.title: moreevvoices.sit
955.author: Anonymous
955.description: This Escape Velocity plug-in was hand-crafted by the same person who produced the fighter speech for EV. These sounds are simply additional voices to add a little variety to the game.

963.title: navallightnings102.sit
963.author: Anonymous
963.description:
Naval Lightnings, By Far World Software and Brian Whalley Tired of watching your lightnings get shredded in combat?  They are now stronger, and they have a new bay, so that you can just go and upgrade your ship, no worries.  They still cost lots of money, and they aren't invincible either.  The next time you land at a type 5 or higher outfitter, you can even purchase a Kestrel that has the bay built in.  On a side note, the revised bay is better managed, so that you can now pack in four Mk 2 Lightnings into your bay. 

If you encounter any problems with this file, a bug fix has been released at http://prophet.damnsw.net/fws/navallightnings102.sit.hqx .

987.title: otp.sit
987.author: Anonymous
987.description:
A Plugin with 4 missions, 2 weapions and one new ship, with origanal 3D graphics.
The new ship, The Orbital turret, is a mostly fixed position ship that packs a punch.
This plug will, if you "Play your cards right" Make a system change goverments.
The Missions focus around a stolen prototype, a pirate blockade, and maybe even Levo's membership in the Rebelion...

710.title: Theepian Government
710.author: Anonymous
710.description: This governent will tolerate ANYTHING you do.  In their government, you are considered an honored leader.  They have no enemies or allies, though.  Mayby I'll give them some in the future. -- Submitted by Stephen Johnson

789.title: CleanRecordv13.sit
789.author: Anonymous
789.description: This is an upgrade to my great plug-in, Clean Record. It adds an outfit that clears all of the bad records you have with every governmnet in the galaxy. This edition adds another new outfit, the HGFC, that allows you to make a hyperspace jump anyware in the system.

902.title: GalacticInsanity.sit
902.author: Anonymous
902.description:
It's just not the same anymore, so get ready for the craziest Escape Velocity plug-in yet!  Galactic Insanity introduces things like your favorite video games into the EV universe.  It's a totally new game the moment you launch it. GI features tons of new ships, weapons, outfits, governments, missions, and a few new systems and planets. If your up for the challenge, Insanity is waiting for you. If not... well...

8/26/00 - Galactic Insanity! version 1.0 by Mike Matarazzo

923.title: JamesFond3.sea
923.author: Anonymous
923.description: Welcome to Her Majesty's Sequined Service. Agent 711, your next mission will involve... The James Fond Plug-in is designed to combine irreverent humor and satire with a series of interesting and challenging missions.

742.title: Ambrosia 1.0.1 Plug-In
742.author: Anonymous
742.description: Ambrosia 1.0.1, the update for Ambrosia 1.0.0, adds two new ships, one new commodity, two outfits, two new fleets, fixes and modifies several items, a new system, and also adds nine new missions. Enjoy!

1006.title: qumre104.sit
1006.author: Anonymous
1006.description: The Quantumire Trilogy is a total conversion for EV.  It has been avalible from meowx.com and a MacAddict CD for a while now, but never from the Ambosia web site.  This plug creates all-new ships, weapons, missions - everything.  EV is a whole new game now.  Version 1.0.4 is the final version for the Trilogy.

1044.title: spam1.0.sit
1044.author: Anonymous
1044.description: Plug this sucker in for 24 new missions with detailed storylines  characters, 3 new "governments," a new system with custom graphics and sounds, a good dose of tongue-in-cheek humor, and lots and lots and LOTS of spam!

773.title: BMW.sea
773.author: Anonymous
773.description:
Battle of Milky Way is a decent plug in by any standards. This has taken me over 7 months to make and it's my 1st. You have to give me a little credit. This is my 1st plug-in ever making. It contains a crapload amount of ships, outfits, weapons, governments, missions, etc. and all new stuff that you will find. This is based on if something different happened in the past. Like we never made the Spacestation. Or we learned space technology to fast. Or we started a war to early. Do you get the point? Download the plug. You might like it.

This is only a beta version. The final version should be release within the next month

682.title: Geryer.sit
682.author: Anonymous
682.description: Geryer adds one new planet which allows the escort carrier to be bought. In the future I hope to add more planets, weapons, and missions. Created by Guy Lagarde, 12-year-old plug-in maker.

684.title: Hawk Shuttle.sit
684.author: Anonymous
684.description: What this plug does is changes the graphix of the shuttlecraft to the graphix of the Hawk fighter, and upgrades the shuttlecraft weaponwise and statwise.

688.title: lots of ships.sit
688.author: Anonymous
688.description: Basically, it allows all of the ships to be bought. The mass driver and neutron cannon weigh less, and ship ability has been increased. Also, the particle beam can be bought without completing the mission. Make sure you remove all other plug-ins from your EV Plug-ins folder. But, "More EV Voices" plug-in should work okay. Created by Guy Lagarde.

693.title: Money Madness v1.0.sit
693.author: Anonymous
693.description: This is a really cool plug-in, you can have over 100 million credits! And you can earn additional credits too. This is my first attempt at a plug-in so I'm sorry if it's a little simple.

695.title: neptron153
695.author: Anonymous
695.description: Neptron 1.5.3 gives Crazed Bulk Freighters a chalky, yellow covering.  Oooh, goody. --Submitted by Stephen Johnson

704.title: Starters
704.author: Anonymous
704.description:
This plug-in makes the Shuttlecraft go slower, but it has 9999 shields, armor, Weaponspace, Cargo.  It also starts with 55 of every fighter in the game.  I call it "starters" because you can make a new guy with it, have a super-shuttle, leave, enter a new plug-in, and have a trade-in value of 36 million.  Enough to buy a good ship, eh?

-TDM

728.title: Shipbuilders Guide.sit
728.author: Anonymous
728.description:
Shipbuilders' Guide 1.0.0 for Infini-D - This stand-alone document provides a complete step-by-step walkthrough for making spaceship graphics for EV/O in Infini-D. All steps are laid out in a simple, easy to understand format with graphical enhancements. 
By Divals the Conqueror (micahg@microserve.net)

757.title: astex2.01.sit
757.author: Anonymous
757.description: Adds a new system with two new spaceports, some new weapons, a lot of missions, and a new ship (the Astex Hulk).

767.title: BetweenTimeAndSpaceTeaser
767.author: Anonymous
767.description:
Between Time And Space Teaser is well. . . a Teaser. It's based on Space Between Software's upcoming Plug-In for Escape Velocity, called Between Time And Space. This T-Plug adds a whole new galaxy (only a few systems for the teaser), new governments, new missions, new ships, new CREATIVITY! Please visit SBS's site at http://www.geocities.com/ev_evo_spacebetweensoftware/
 THANK YOU! SEEYA!

801.title: darkstorm1.02.sit
801.author: Anonymous
801.description: This creates the galaxy in my own image, with one new system. The systems have been better spaced and some of the obvious planet picture to descriptions have been made more congruent.

822.title: E2updater.sit
822.author: Anonymous
822.description: This updater performs some minor cosmetic fixes and repairs an out of order mission.  To use, simply place the enclosed update in the same Plug-ins folder as EMPIRE 2: DARK HORIZONS.  Please remove and trash any previous updater you may be using.  At version 1.3, the plug would appear to be comletely bug-free.  The folder contains a complete version history.

857.title: ev webboard governments.s
857.author: Anonymous
857.description: Ever thought that EV just didn't have enough governments? Well geuss what, now it doesn't! Escape Velocity Webboard Governments was made by me, Nova6, but designed almost entirely by several other people on the Escape Velocity Webboard who submitted designs for new governments, weapons, planets, etc. With seven new governments, tons of new graphics, and plenty of weapons, ships, and outfits, EV Webboard Governments is an excellent plug-in!  -  Nova6

871.title: evplugs
871.author: Anonymous
871.description: This plug in does two main things.  One it adds a new beam weapon that you can buy.  And two it allows you to buy ships like the Bulk Freighter and Luxury Liner.  I am planning on allowing the purchase of a Rebel Bulk Freighter and painting it red.  You would be able to buy that after the Rebel Alien missions. You can E-Mail me at jmera@wcoil.com

887.title: flightacademy.sit
887.author: Anonymous
887.description:
Welcome to Flight Academy!
     Flight Academy is an EV Plug-in designed to teach new players how to fly, trade, and fight. Flight Academy will take you through a series of missions that will instruct you as you progress. You will experience using a number of ships, weapons, and learn many strategies for trading and combat. In the end, you will have a Kestrel and a decent amount of money. This plug-in is recommended for beginning players, but more experienced pilots may find it enjoyable as well.

941.title: LovelyHunsruck.sit
941.author: Anonymous
941.description: This is a small plug with funny and difficult missions (don't expect the usual go-and-kill). If you manage to solve the riddles, you are rewarded with the permission to dock at the Satellite Of Love!! As a special feature you might find some evil Windows(TM). Do whatever you want to do with them -)

970.title: NewBars.sit
970.author: Anonymous
970.description:
Put one Plug (Coldbar for example) into your Plug-In´s folder and start EV.
Because only few Plug´s change the right bars, you should now have a new bar on the right.
You can only use one new bar at a time.

982.title: nova bracket warning
982.author: Anonymous
982.description: Nova Brackets and Nova Warning port the targeting brackets and warning image from EVN to EV and EVO (both versions included). Done by EVula.

1002.title: planetarydefenses1.2.sit
1002.author: Anonymous
1002.description: Planetary Defenses modifies the standard EV planets and stations' defense dudes, so that there will be ground forces defending their home, as well as the defense fleet.

1050.title: ssemulator1.0.sit
1050.author: Anonymous
1050.description: This plugin is designed to make Escape Velocity sound better, it replaces many of the original sounds with pseudo-surround sounds.

1084.title: The Grinchians1.0.sit
1084.author: Anonymous
1084.description: This plug is a high-quality plug, meaning that each element thereof has been lovingly crafted and carefully thought out (usually in that order). For starters, you wont find any silly omissions, such as missing graphics in the shipyard or outfit shop. In addition, all the missions, descriptions, and other manifold text bites in The Grinchians are in English. Yes, you heard me: good, old, well-composed English, quite a rare beast these days. Im not Shakespeare, but I made darned sure there were actual sentences with subjects and verbs. It doesnt stop there either, folks. I did my best to ensure a consistant, well-rounded story and even flew each of the new ships around for awhile. No one is perfect, however, so please dont hesitate to deal me an electronic lashing for any errors which slipped by me.

1102.title: USW.sit
1102.author: Anonymous
1102.description: This plugin allows you to purchase ships that are normally unpurchasable.

1104.title: Valhalla1.sit
1104.author: Anonymous
1104.description: The Valhalla Plug-In adds three new ships and twelve new outfits. The ships and outfits don't replace any of the original resources from EV v1.0.5. The new ships and outfits have there own graphics and no copy's of the originals.

679.title: Fireball 1.1.sea
679.author: Anonymous
679.description:
EXTRA! EXTRA!  Fireball 1.1 is released!  Many people have complained about a bug that delets the sidebar.  This was a blooper caused by a blank PICT resource with the ID of the sidebar.  This update fixes that, along with a corrected Read-me. The old one still works, though, and some people actually like it without words or graphics (it still shows you the information, just no green background or metal bars).  This is merely a correction, it does not, in any way at all, NEED to be used.
--------------------------
CyberDragon

877.title: EVUltra
877.author: Anonymous
877.description: The Good News: You have managed to survive against the might of an alien warship. You boast all the time you enter a bar about your great battle and people never seem to get tired of you blabbing on. The Bad News: A Confederation Official crashes in on your glory and tells you that the entire galaxy is endangered by a new alien threat, the alien craft you destroyed was on the run from this new alien menace, their technological rating is stronger than the Confederation by 10 fold, the Confederation desperately needs your help, and you probably wont survive!

1048.title: Spartus1.3
1048.author: Anonymous
1048.description: Spartus is for those people who are getting bored with the original EV universe. It replaces every ship whith diffrent graphics, weapons, stats, and others (execpt for the Luxury Liner). It also adds weapons, people, dudes, missions, and fun other stuff. Enjoy!

712.title: Ultimate Shuttlecraft.sit
712.author: Anonymous
712.description:
Have you ever dreamed of  killing an Alien Crusier with a shuttlecraft? Now you can do it for real with this EV plug-in. Test it and e-mail me if you have problems or say how I can make this plug-in better. -Hampus Lindin(zupmah_jidder@hotmail.com

This is one of my two first plug-ins. If someone can tell me how i make ships and outfits with Res-edit i can make GREAT plug-ins.

754.title: Asteridian 3.0.sit
754.author: Anonymous
754.description:
Fixes about 3 billion bugs from the last version. It runs pretty clean and safely now.
Adds so many planets I forgot how many I added, around 20 new ship (forgot that too!),
and 3 new governments. (I actually remembered how many!)
Well worth the download. : )

776.title: bountyplus201-1
776.author: Anonymous
776.description: Bounty Plus takes you inside the mysterious organization known as the Bounty Hunters Guild, a loose association of soldiers of fortune, hot-shot fighter pilots, wealthy, powerful merchant princes, and outlaws looking for a second chance... Latest version fixes a few bugs and adds some new stuff. Check it out!. Requires Bounty Graphics 2.0 (800k).

818.title: E1-WAR WITHOUT END.sea
818.author: Anonymous
818.description: (version 2.0) This is the plug-in that started it all! As outlined previously, it centers on the conflict between the oppressive Terran Star Empire and a ragtag group of aliens known as The Weave who have formed a temporary alliance to fight off Empire annexation. You can fly for these rebels, the Empire or even organised crime if you prefer. There are 30 new ships, 48 new weapons/outfits and about 100 new missions. The plug-in comes complete with an extended stand-alone document which gives greater detail as to the storyline and factions. I recommend you download the Empire 2.0 -- 2.1 Updater, a simple update that repairs a problem with the Empire storyline that causes a certain fleet not to appear at a pivotal battle. If you are having problems with the mission "No Turning Back", simply install this update in the plugin folder. Thanks to Ace McCloud for pointing this out.

1015.title: RebelBattleship
1015.author: Anonymous
1015.description: Rebel Battleship is a plugin that adds the one ship, the Rebel Battleship, that is very powerful. It is for those people that don't like to watch the Rebels get pulvirized by the Confed Crusiers. It's not a cheat, because you have to get a mission to get it, and it costs lots. Also, it adds a few new missions. Enjoy!

862.title: EVEnabler101.sit
862.author: Anonymous
862.description: This plug enables ALL of the ships and outfits present in the stock EV. This means you can finally buy all those things only the computer had access to before. Each of the new items comes with re-drawn graphics, replacing that unattractive green "X", but also making it a little larger. Its also streamlined, which should eliminate any conflicts with existing plugs.

856.title: EV solid 1.0a.sea
856.author: Anonymous
856.description:
solid's main concept is to provide a more balanced gameplay, mainly by changing the universe and not adding to it. the player now has a more free 
choice between the two sides (rebels/confeds), all of their graphics were changed to fit the new atmosphere, new ships added, the player can 
take a role closer to a carrier one now (gaining ships/weapons as he completes missions etc), new weapon and much more ...

this is probably the last version, although it is basically done there may still be problems here and there - i've posted this now because i 
don't have any more time to finish the work on it, i think it's enough though.
check the homepage at http://www.syrogite.f2s.com/solid/index.html

 i've put the wrong file in the other post, this one should be ok, sorry for the inconvenience
9/7/2001, version 1.0A

939.title: Lone Cruiser plug
939.author: Anonymous
939.description:
The lone Cruiser plug is a little joke on the EV web board members. 
It replaces the Shuttlecraft with a lone cruiser
this is the first plug I've ever subbmited so I hope it works.

670.title: EV Helper
670.author: Anonymous
670.description: Created By Robin Prygrocki. This cheater will do the basics but it will make the Particle Beam not waste feul and be able to purchase. It will also make ALL of the ships availible.

677.title: EVUltraCheater.sit
677.author: Anonymous
677.description: This plugin is absouloutely wonderful. Really I mean it. When you communicate with a planet (in the year 2251) and demand tribute it will say the usual, the defense fleet thing right, do it again and the planet will automatically surrender! Also many suprises are included. Name it "EV Data" and youre on your way!

699.title: Rebel Battleship
699.author: Anonymous
699.description: by Madman. Rebel Battleship is for the people that don't like to sit by and watch the Rebels get smashed by the huge Confed Crusier. This plugin adds one ship, the Rebel Battleship, that can obliverate any Confed ship you throw at it!

1007.title: qumre104u.sit
1007.author: Anonymous
1007.description: If you have The Quantumire Trilogy v1.0.2 or v1.0.3, you can download this plug in to update your copy to version 1.0.4, which is Quantumire's final version.

1106.title: variety
1106.author: Anonymous
1106.description: You don't keep the outfits that came with your ship, so why should the computer? Variety adds more variety amoung ships, so you'll run into Kestrels without fighter bays and with space bombs, Corvettes with fighter bays, Argosys with Proton Bolts, and more as you travel through the galaxy.

664.title: dEViator
664.author: Anonymous
664.description: dEViator is a cheat for Escape Velocity, which allows you to land on Levo, and come out with 2M credits, an Alien Cruiser, 10 proton turrets, a particle beam, tractor beam, and cloaking device. Also, blast off, kill an Argosy, and earn yourself a quick "Ultimate" combat rating!

876.title: Evulas3DTargets.sit
876.author: Anonymous
876.description: EVulas 3D Targets is, well, a plug with 3D target grafix done by me. I think they look pretty cool, as target pics go, but if I thought they looked dumb, I wouldnt be posting them on EV.com, now would I?

966.title: Neutronic Kestrel.sea
966.author: Anonymous
966.description: For those who are hooked on the famous Neutronic Kestrel Clavius Interceptor and wish to keep it to play other EV plug-ins, 'Neutronic Kestrel 1.1' simply adds this ship and all its neutronic weapons. So, this shortened plug-in should be easily compatible with other plug-ins.

1099.title: TweakIt v1B
1099.author: Anonymous
1099.description: Tweak-It 2001 does just that to Escape Velocity - it tweaks it.  Adding some features and stuffs to EV, but not enough to change it from the good ol' game that you like.  This plug-in is generally compatible with most basic plug-ins, but not often with any drastic, EV-changing ones. This is the first Public release of Tweak-it and hopefully there will be much more to come.

1122.title: yster1.00.sit
1122.author: Anonymous
1122.description: Ever since the civil war began, engineers on both sides have wanted to turn a profit. Since the founding of Yster, this dream has been realized...

1033.title: Satori Station Update
1033.author: Anonymous
1033.description: Fixes "the game quits when I hyper into Regulus" bug. A must-have for anyone with v1.0

997.title: Persons of EVwebboard.sea
997.author: Anonymous
997.description: Ever wanted to be in the Escape Velocity universe? Well now you can! Persons of the EV Webboard adds 20 or so new persons, all based on people who visit the Escape Velocity webboards!! The only other thing this plug-in adds is an Ambrosia government used only for Matt Burch and Andrew Welch. I will eventually make an update for Persons of the EV Webboard, with more persons, and maybe a few other things. Enjoy! - Captain Carnotaur

1031.title: SateliteOfLove.sit
1031.author: Anonymous
1031.description: The Satelite of Love plug-in provides the much sought after, often discussed but never seen (in the game), Satelite of Love. The are two files one with an associated mission and the other as a stand alone spob in case of compatability restraints due to other plug-ins the pilot is currently using.

655.title: Availability Cheat
655.author: Anonymous
655.description:
Availability Cheat for Escape Velocity is a plug-in that allows you to purchase all ships, including the Rebel and Confed ones. You don't have to do any missions for them, either, although you can do a new mission. You can also buy all weapons, at reasonable prices. I have also created a working Hyperspace Speed Mod, and a Hyperspace Distance Mod. All weapons have descriptions and graphics- no more of that unattractive green 'X'. Some weapons and ships are only available at certain planets, ie. Confed stuff @ Luna, Rebel stuff @ Palshife. Hope you find it useful!

    --Reuben Edwards ( reued@lineone.net , http://website.lineone.net/~reued/ )--

658.title: CAPs super plugs
658.author: Anonymous
658.description: This is two new and hopefully fun plug-ins.  it has been tested with 1.0.5 and works perfectly fine.  one plugin makes one dinky ship one of the strongest and can take down five fed crusers with ease and also has another trick...  the other ands two new outfits and some outfits u just couldn't get... and there just might be another surprise... =D

663.title: Cords EV Cheat
663.author: Anonymous
663.description: This plug-in provides a comprehensive collection of cheats. It allows players to complete all the missions for the Confederation and the Rebellion with the same pilot. It also allows players to purchase every ship and outfit for zero credits, and increases the effectiveness of armor, shield, cargo, and fuel mods. Most items can now be purchased in amounts up to 999 and all ships have increased gun and turret capacity. Ferry passenger missions now pay 100 million credits. Picts and descriptions have been added where necessary and all alien weapons will now remain with ships. In addition to these improvements the plug-in adds a "blanket" fake id, a hyperspace distance mod, and a hyperspace speed mod.

669.title: EV Data.sit
669.author: Anonymous
669.description: This is a modified data file for ev and it lets you buy confed and rebel ships with out completing the missions that normaly enable them. If you have any questons or comments please e mail me at: sam6519575@yahoo.com   I plan to make the downloads available at my site www.gamesandguidesreviewedforyou.g2gm.com made by (AK)clownhunter

672.title: EV-AliensBeams.sit
672.author: Anonymous
672.description:
EV-Aliens + Beams:
Everybody likes the Aliens, right? And everyone knows how cool beam projectors are.  So why not have some?  The Aliens plug makes the Alien warships and their weaponry available for a slightly-greater-than-modest fee, and the beams plug makes  all-new outfits available for your use.  Things cost a decent amount of money, so you ain't really cheating, and the Alien things are only available on a couple worlds, which made sense to have an Alien ship stashed away...
By The Keeper Of Souls and Far World Software

689.title: luxury shuttle.sit.bin
689.author: Anonymous
689.description: Luxury Shuttle is designed for those who are too anxious, hasty, whatever you wanna call it, so they can skip the annoying time of being weak and frail as a shuttle. Luxury Shuttle simply changes the price of the Shuttlecraft so that it is worth 15million in trade in price. This allows you to buy generally any buyable ship in the game, and outfit it as well.

727.title: Kicking Butt in EV
727.author: Anonymous
727.description: Ever want to kill that stupid Confed cruiser with your measly Argosy?  Tired of getting picked on by pirates?  Got an addiction to EV?  Then download the Guide to kicking butt in ev.  I show you my personal tactic to killing everything in sight, and lend my personal opinion on many things.

777.title: BountyPlus201
777.author: Anonymous
777.description: The Bounty Hunters -- we've seen them, fought them, hacked them to fly shuttlecraft. . . Now we can join them.  Bounty Plus takes you inside the mysterious organization known as the Bounty Hunters Guild, a loose association of soldiers of fortune, hot-shot fighter pilots, wealthy, powerful merchant princes, and outlaws looking for a second chance...

811.title: DestroyerWars2.1
811.author: Anonymous
811.description: This is the next upgrade to Destroyer Wars.  I really didn't have the problem with the linking of the systems fixed.  A few other things have been added.  Have Fun.  Made By Alex Wouters.  Oh and if the program crashes when you hyper into Apollo, it only happens once and I don't Know why it does that.

831.title: Enhanced Buttons
831.author: Anonymous
831.description: This plug-in adds enhanced buttons to the EV/O Interface. The button graphics are the same, but they have been given a true 3d bevel.

853.title: EV Destroyer 1.2
853.author: Anonymous
853.description:
This plug-in adds: 2 new outfits, 4 new ships, 35 new missions, 31 new personalities, 34 new dudes, and 7 other new things you should not waste time looking for. This edition is a lot better than 1.0. These are all the same missions as 1.0, but beefed up with cool stuff. I also fixed the known errors from 1.0. It has the same storyline from 1.0, but better.
By Destroyer E

860.title: EVBoom.sit
860.author: Anonymous
860.description: EV Boom! is a simple plugin for Ambrosia Softwares Escape Velocity. It changes the explosion graphics in EV from those tiny little sparks to big dramatic fireballs. All you have to do is drop it in your "EV Plugs" folder and you ready to go! There are no known incompatibilities. So you can use this plug along with all your other favorites!

861.title: EVDeutsch103.sit
861.author: Anonymous
861.description: Sensation! EV Deutsch! Mein Plugin, bersetzt EV auf Deutsch - so gut es ein Plug eben kann - und beinhaltet zustzlich eine Menge berraschungen. Also dann, herunterladen, hinein in den EV plug-in Ordner und ausprobieren.

864.title: evgeproxhelp.sit
864.author: Anonymous
864.description:
EVGE Players: Sick of waiting for the Crippled Bird-of-Prey to show up so that you can start the Proxima mission string?  The EVGE Proxima Helper is for you.  Just drop it into your plug-ins folder with EVGE, and you'll be able to start the mission string right away, in any spaceport bar.
Brought to you by Cymltaneous Solutions: http://cs.paching.com/

909.title: GreatWar0.sea
909.author: Anonymous
909.description:
They came without warning.  A few months after the start of the Great War,
humanity has been reduced to several core systems and worlds.  As a young Navy
pilot, you must lead the attack against the murderous Aliens.  Your actions will lead
to victory... or extinction.
     Version 0.0 is the prototype of Great War.  The Great War universe is presented
for comments, suggestions, and bug reports, with an abbreviated (try two) set of
missions in Great War's story line.

944.title: Maelstrom-15-plugin.sit
944.author: Anonymous
944.description: Maelstrom for EV adds four ships from Ambrosia's classic, Maelstrom.

967.title: NeutronTurret.sit
967.author: Anonymous
