967.description: This plug adds the neutron turret, a turreted and improved form of the neutron blaster.

994.title: pegasusmissions1.1.sit
994.author: Anonymous
994.description: The Perseus system is frequently attacked by pirate ships. Trader ships from Pegasus is often boarded. While the neighbor Blackthorne station is mysteriously growing rich. Is there a connection?"

996.title: PersonalitiesPlug.sit
996.author: Anonymous
996.description: Has one completely new ship, all the original EV ships are now modified, theres also 5 new outfits, including 2 weapons, a shield, a fuel scoop, and galactic map, enjoy!

999.title: pilots helper
999.author: Anonymous
999.description: This plugin makes small upgrades to several of the ships you may get earlier in the game, enhancing your chances of surviving. Also, it includes a short range, but extremely strong beam weapon.

1003.title: PlanetsPlug
1003.author: Anonymous
1003.description: This is my first plug.  It adds more planets and some different system names. I hope to add ships and systems and outfits in the future so keep your eyes open for updates and i hope you enjoy my plug. thanks!

1056.title: StarFX1.sea
1056.author: Anonymous
1056.description: StarFX is a new power in the galaxy. Located in the southeast of the galaxy, they control more than you may think. Ally with the rebellion, they are a force to be reckoned with. 6 ships, 5 systems, 7 stellars, 1 gov. 1 dude, 2 fleets, 2 pers. and new intro text.

1066.title: Supershield 1.1
1066.author: Anonymous
1066.description: sigh... I made a mistake...  It seems I have made a mistake... Apparently, the Ultrapacitor didn't work properly.  I am posting this new one, with an updated read-me.

738.title: alien.sit
738.author: Anonymous
738.description: This new alien plug-in contains 4 new systems with 4 new planets, not too big so it wont be such a pain, new missions to get money or weapon rewards.

650.title: 1Jump.sit
650.author: Anonymous
650.description: This is for desperate cheaters only. Makes navigating very easy in fact, you can get just about anywhere in the galaxy in five jumps, max- usually, it's a lot shorter. For example, it's just one jump from Satori to the system Ruby's in. Quite useful if you have a low fuel capacity and don't care about cheating.

698.title: Plug-Ins Ultra Package.sea
698.author: Anonymous
698.description:
Plug-Ins Ultra Package has to be the greatest package for you fellow cheaters out there this there are twentynine plug-ins for you to enjoy. So download and enjoy.

If you have any comments or suggestions than just e-mail me at
kc3@amen.net

I have made over fifty plug-ins and they will soon be uploaded on my site at
members.truepath.com/kc3/index.html

736.title: Alien Empire 1.1.hqx
736.author: Anonymous
736.description: The best upgrade ever!  This is the upgrade to Alien Empire.  You must read the read-me.  This was all made by Alex Wouters.

766.title: BetterRamscoop.sit
766.author: Anonymous
766.description: A simple plug that will increase fuel regeneration 4 times over the normal ramscoop. Helpful if you use my style of planetary conquest or if you are one to often make your last jump into an uninhabited or unfriendly system and don't want to wait as long to refill your tanks.  Comments or questions should be sent to eaglesong@ncinternet.net

865.title: EVGovtFixer1.0.sit
865.author: Anonymous
865.description:
How often has something like this happened to you: You're right in the middle of a huge 
battle. You see several Rebel ships ganging up on a Confed Cruiser, so you move in for the kill
It's almost gone, when one of you're rockets misses and hits a Rebel Cruiser. Suddenly, every
ship in the system is mad at you. This set of plug-ins should fix that. They will make it so
you're weapons can't hit ships of thier respevtive governments, and the ships of those governments
will never attack you. Also, I had to make merchants the same (except in the one for Pirates).
Otherwise, all you Pirates out there could just put in the Rebel or Confed Plug and go kill everyone 
else. Alough I have two plugs out for EVO, this is my first plug for EV. Enjoy.

968.title: New LetheanCydonian ships
968.author: Anonymous
968.description: Enough of seeing always-the-same, dumb, in open market Lethean and Cydonian ships? This plug-in make them use one new ship each, inspired from 2 they were using before. Not brand-new graphics, but new graphics already. You can't buy them now (but you can easily capture them), but an add-on in the future will make missions for you to buy them. If anything, e-mail me at Lebpierre@AOL.com, or find Zacha Pedro on the boards (mainly in the EV(O) boards). The other version does not work!

978.title: NFSA 1.0
978.author: Anonymous
978.description:
This plug-in adds 5 new ships for EV:

Defender Carrier
Picon
Molicon
MOPS
Big Freighter 

Made by: Zupmah Artworks, Inc
Contact: zupmah_jidder@hotmail.com

733.title: AEV.sit
733.author: Anonymous
733.description: Advanced EV is a plug-in for the original Escape Velocity.  Very simply, it makes EV more difficult, by making the ships the computer uses more powerful without altering the ships you purchase.  It also changes a few things: For example, if you buy a Confed ship, the Rebellion will attack you, but if you capture a Confed ship, the Confederation will attack you!

660.title: CleanRecordv14.sit
660.author: Anonymous
660.description: This is the newest version of my great plug-in Clean Record. It allows you to clear your record with any government in the galaxy. This version also includes the HGFC, which allows you to make a hyperspace jump any where in the system. It also includes the Jump Core, which cuts the time it takes for any hyperspace jump down to one day.

668.title: EV CreditsMax
668.author: Anonymous
668.description: After selecting a pilot file with this patch, a new pilot file will be created with the credits maxed out (1.6 billion).

737.title: Alien Empire
737.author: Anonymous
737.description: This changes the confeds and rebels to Aliens and Terran Rebels.  All ships weapons are more powerful so you can really heck it out!  Made by Alex Wouters!!!!!!!!!!!!!

741.title: AlteredStates105.sit
741.author: Anonymous
741.description: Altered States alters outfit sizes, weapon physics, outfit descriptions, and ship specifications. Generally, outfits are more compact and weapons are more capable.

796.title: CoolerButton101
796.author: Anonymous
796.description: Cooler EV Buttons replaces the standard interface buttons in Escape Velocity with Pontus Ilbrings own version.

798.title: Crazy!.sit
798.author: Anonymous
798.description: Crazy! is not your regular plug-in it adds the most absurd of ships and weapons. You can even fly around in a plunger while shooting Kestrels!

847.title: EV-Sole Survivor
847.author: Anonymous
847.description: I am proud to present to you... Escape Velocity: Sole Survivor (Development Version). As the name states, this is a DEVELOPMENT VERSION meaning there might be some bugs and there is a lot to add. Well, good luck and have fun! Fetchy

858.title: EVAdventures10.sit
858.author: Anonymous
858.description: The idea here is to cram as much adventure and replay value into as little RAM as possible. Modified ships, weapons, outfits, dudes, fleets, and 48 new missions. None of the modifications unbalance the game because the bad guys get them too.

995.title: People1.sit
995.author: Anonymous
995.description: People has been released containing over 250 actual people. The names are good and the prices are fair when boarding. It also contains extra features such as a new side screen.

1008.title: raiders1.2.sit
1008.author: Anonymous
1008.description: Avast ye scurvy scum. Come about and prepare to be boarded. The Raiders have joined with the pirates. Pirate ships are harder to defeat, but more booty when you do. 10 ships, 7 weapons, 2 non weapon outfits, 4 systems, numerous fleets, missions etc.

1010.title: raptor1.2.sit
1010.author: Anonymous
1010.description: New features include a new government, four new ships and two new fleets. No longer compatible with 68 plug-ins. This version fixes a number of bugs.

1027.title: rsf0.99b1.sit
1027.author: Anonymous
1027.description: RSF is a new shipping company, Rebel Shipping Force, located on RSF HQ in the system Guron, which is in between Satori and Clotho. Lots of missions.

1105.title: valkyrie1.1.sit
1105.author: Anonymous
1105.description: Valkyrie adds one ship, the Atinoda IVX-4 Valkyrie, to EV. The Valkyrie is based on the Kestrel, but is closer to a massively upgraded Clipper in its multirole design.

1139.title: evfbcollection1.0.sit
1139.author: Anonymous
1139.description: The EV Fighter Bay Collection contains outfit images (PICT format) for the patrol ship, gunboat, manta, lightning, and defender fighters, and also includes a blank hanger scene fixed up in Photoshop for your own custom fighter bays. Feel free to use any of these images for your plugin projects. -Joseph "Captain Skyblade" Payne - joseph.payne@tmgmedia.net

1117.title: WinTheWar.cpt
1117.author: Anonymous
1117.description: Put your ultimate combat rating to the ultimate test and Win the War!  Run 30 exciting missions and watch the hated Confederation disappear planet-by-planet forever!  New ships, new weapons, and new governments complete the picture.  Thanks to B  B shipyard for the Mako graphic, and a special thanks to William Friley for other graphics, including the cool Thidian wormhole.  So, download WinTheWar now and Win the War!  Start at any Rebellion planet.  Good luck, Captain.  WinTheWar by Kent Graybeal.

752.title: Artifact1.sit
752.author: Anonymous
752.description: This plug-in was inspired by the Babylon5 movie "Third Space". It adds several ships, weapons, sounds, and outfits, as well as a mission set of 20 or so missions. The missions start at Levo.

781.title: Button Changer 1
781.author: Anonymous
781.description: This plug-in will change the default grey buttons used in EV to a more suitable green. I made this because I was sick of the grey buttons with the white text (aka hard to read). With a bit of tweaking it could be used with EVO, but I can't do that right now. By Mantaray {emptytrash@aol.com}

842.title: EV Plug-in Asteridian2
842.author: Anonymous
842.description:
This plug adds 1 new government,4 new ships,8 new upgrades,and 5 new systems. It stars the new Astridian race who have joined the fight for independence with the Rebellion.For original EV only.Expect a sequel.....
-Dan Wilson

848.title: ev-target-graphics.sit
848.author: Anonymous
848.description: This plug-in replaces those boring, 2D cross-section views of ships with all-new, easy-to-read, full-color 3D views of the ship. A great enhancement. Available for Star Wars 1.0, Star Wars: ANA and Star Wars: ANA SE.

867.title: EVMissionControl.sea
867.author: Anonymous
867.description: EV Mission Control allows you to manipulate EVs standard missions in many ways. Have you ever wanted to play the same mission twice? Well, with this plug-in you can...

931.title: KSV Entreprises.sit
931.author: Anonymous
931.description: KSV Entreprises fights for resources and food against the SSV Corporation. This plug-in adds 3 new ships, 5 new weapons, 16 outfits and two systems.

981.title: nod1.0b1.sit
981.author: Anonymous
981.description: Strange new ships have arrived in the Serpens Nebula, plundering everything in sight, including each other. Is this a new alien threat...?

1036.title: ShipsGalore 1.12

Luke
ray.mueller@verizon.net

10/9/02 
Virmor

880.title: extraships1.3.sit

Extra Ships 1.3 also eliminates all of the "blank spots" and the ugly green X's that plague several related plugins, including Extra Ships 1.2.1. 1088.description:

With about 30 new missions, 20 new ships, and 30 new systems to explore, The Cygnus Alliance will be one of the final plug-ins for Escape Velocity you will want to get.

Welcome to the world you thought you knew. Are you ready?
Plug-in by Captain Z (captainz@mac.com)

Foundation replaces the entire EV Galaxy. Foundation is set at the

It also has a new system with 4 new stations and planets (a sort of mining base for the Rebels) and a new mission which can be found there. E-mail me at reued@lineone.net, and tell me what you think!

1038.title: ShipsGalore II 1.0.cpt
1038.author: Anonymous
1038.description:
It's ready! I have worked overtime on this, but I managed it in the end! This is the sequel to ShipsGalore- ShipsGalore II. In
            this, I have replaced all the ships of ShipsGalore with new ones. Weapons stay the same, save for some being upgraded.

            Heavy Cruiser. E-mail me at reued@lineone.net and tell me what you think!

661.title: ClearMissionBits.cpt
661.author: Anonymous
661.description: Tired of starting a new pilot each time a new plugin comes along?  Well now you just use ClearMissionBits, and you just keep right on using the same pilot!   What is a mission bit?  Well it is a way for you to not run the same mission over and over.  They also come in handy for missions that take place in a certain order.  Trouble is, once you set a mission bit for one plugin, it is set for all of them.  With ClearMissionBits, you reset those bits so they can be used again!  ClearMissionBits 1.0 by Kent Graybeal.

Face massive Alien fleets, a Confederate traitor fleet, Pirate Fleets, a Confederation fleet with Rebel ships, and meet some strange merchants on your way! I hope you enjoy this file very much!

By Destroyer E

Comments can be forwarded to the author at islest@tnet.net and the official homepage is at http://www.geocities.com/empire_trilogy.

This plug-in is generally compatible with most basic plug-ins, but not likely with any that change the systems in the EV universe.

951.title: MissionPatch10.sit
951.author: Anonymous
951.description:
I have been playing EV for a long time. I had finally achieved my final goal...I received the "Investigate Disappearances" mission. It was for the Confeds. I went through the cycle of missions, but couldn't destroy the alien cruiser. So, I cheated, using my home-made "Fusion Beam" to mutilate the alien bastards. Triumphant, I sold my Fusion Beam and returned to Mars, thus gaining the ability to buy Confed ships on Luna.

Later, I flew to Palshife. To my surprise, I found that I could also buy Rebel ships there. I figured that there was some small bug. Then, I went to the bar...and was offered the "Investigate Disappearances" mission by the Rebels! Now, I realized, here was a stupid mistake, not just some small bug. I accepted anyway, and finished the mission. Then, I was offered the "Lead Rebel Patrol" mission, and found a missing period and another stupid mistake in the intro text. I hate bad grammar - it really diminishes from the play experience. So, I decided to make this plug-in "patch." It fixes all of those things.

952.title: missionsgalore2.0.sit
952.author: Anonymous
952.description:
This is actually not one plug in but a collection of plugins. Each one is a seperate string of Missions.

1014.title: rebelalliance1.50.sit
1014.author: Anonymous
1014.description: This plug-in adds substantially to the EV universe. A quick run down of what it adds: 16-misn's 12-new dudes 10-modified dudes 50-pers 9-ships 6-outf's 4-weap's 50-syst's, 14 which are hidden 38-spob's, 1-new bar in existing spob 6-govt's 9-new or modified flet's.

1016.title: rebeldreadnought1.0.sit
1016.author: Anonymous
1016.description: A Rebel version of a Confed Cruiser

1020.title: rebelstriker.sit
1020.author: Anonymous
1020.description: The Rebel Striker is a bit more powerful than the Gunboat, being based on a Rapier. Also includes a fixed version of my Rapier Bay.

1021.title: recession1.0.sit
1021.author: Anonymous
1021.description: A very simple plug that reduces the base prices of goods in EV 1.0.1 so that trading is not so lucrative.

1039.title: Shuttles VS Freighters
1039.author: Anonymous
1039.description:
SHUTTLES VS FREIGHTERS

This is a interesting plug that replaces the war between the Rebels and the Confeds with the Shuttles and the Freighters. It is a different story line but has no new missions or graphics. 
You need to start a new pilot because I took out a lot of ships and systems. You need to rename the origonal EV Data file "Ev Data.old" or something and put this EV data into the EV folder.
David@ars-nova.com

1040.title: SI SR2
1040.author: Anonymous
1040.description: The SR2 is a fighter/interceptor with lots of weapons space and almost no cargo space. It comes pre-equipped with two Proton Cannons a Javelin Pod and a new secondary weapon I call the Plasma Array. It should be available at most shipyards for the low, low price of $3 million (it's a bargain!) For comparison purposes, I'd rank it just below the Kestrel. At least, that was my intention

1054.title: StarclashCv10
1054.author: Anonymous
1054.description: This is a port of the Plug-in I made for Nova. It adds the Protoss Carrier and Terran Battle Cruiser to EV. Expand with StuffIt 6.5.1. contact me: dfree@mac-email.com

1058.title: starwars2.05upd.sit
1058.author: Anonymous
1058.description: The hopefully final version: more missions, fixes bugs, adds a TIE Advanced, an E-Wing, and a really cool AT-AT for Captain Hector that walks as it turns.

1060.title: starwarsfix1.sit
1060.author: Anonymous
1060.description: This is a fix for the plugin "Star Wars!" for those who are having problems with the graphics. This fixes the Bulk Freighter, Corvette, Death Star, Mon Calamari, and Star Destroyer.

1062.title: STEV.sit
1062.author: Anonymous
1062.description: STEV was made by Troy and Trent. It is the best Star Trek plug-in for EV today. It includes all the ships you know and love about the Star Trek universe. Also all correct solar systems in the Star Trek universe. This plug-in does not have any missions, which means you already have access to the ships. This is not a cheat plug-in at all. If you have any questions abou the plug-in, e-mail the authors at trententtye@mac.com .

1067.title: swedishkeyboard.sit
1067.author: Anonymous
1067.description: So, EV 1.0.2 is here. I was asked to UL this plug when it was released. It fixes a foreign keyboard bug, but ONLY WITH SWEDISH KEYBOARDS. Enjoy.

1068.title: Switch Sides 1.1.cpt
1068.author: Anonymous
1068.description: Fixes the rebel Switch Sides mission so that it is no longer a dead end by adding a Switch Sides II mission. Also adds similar missions for the Confeds.

1077.title: Terran Rebellion Folder
1077.author: Anonymous
1077.description: This add-on changes the way you look at EV!  After I looked at my Alien Empire Add-on I decided to change it totally, so I changed it to Terran Rebellion.  This add-on has better graphics, a whole new map, one new mission, new weapons, and cool ships.  So download it now!  And because it's a beta version with full missions I would like you to tell me what missions you would like and what I should fix with it.  Email me at wouties@mac.com

1081.title: terrawattsg.sit
1081.author: Anonymous
1081.description: The terrawatt shield generator is an experimental device created by Bonsai Industries. It uses matter/antimatter converters to generate power into the terrawatt range, considerably boosting shields.

1091.title: ThePrivateersReadMe.sit
1091.author: Anonymous
1091.description: This is not a new plugin. I was checking ev site to see if there still was a plugin I made a long time ago. And lo, there was one: The Privateers. It fairs not so bad and I checked it again and saw that the read me was not accurate. So here is an update of the Readme file

1092.title: TheVisitorDemo.sit
1092.author: Anonymous
1092.description: This demo allows you to purchase five new ships from any tech level 3 planet or station, at the small price of only 1000 credits! Each ship has its new weapons, which can be restocked at any tech level 2 planet or station, at the even smaller price of 500 credits! We have also included the special weapon: "Lethal Ejection". (NOTE: The outfit descriptions have not been included as they were not finished in time. Fortunately this does not diminish your enjoyment in any way.)

1095.title: Torgo And Beyond Messed Up.Bin
1095.author: Anonymous
1095.description:
This plug-in is not complete in fact, it's full of bugs, mainly the accidental deletion of the Confederation government. I reccomend you don't play it unless you can fix the bugs. If you can fix the bugs, or just the Confed problem, then please send the fixed plug back to me at the email address below, and I'll give you a person and a planet in the plug! If this plug seems really crappy even once the bugs are fixed, well, keep in mind that it's still in a muddled development phase. :p
Luke
ray.mueller@verizon.net

1100.title: uglyplug0.5b3.sit
1100.author: Anonymous
1100.description: This plugin contains 3 ships and 2 weapons with original graphics. The release is soon to come. To get the UgLyHeLL, change the price and availibility with ResEdit.

1103.title: utopia0.999.sit
1103.author: Anonymous
1103.description: Creates 2 new governments, 4 new systems with several planets, 5 new ships plus 2 weapons, several new personalities and 12 exciting new missions. Now Stormbringer compatible!

1107.title: Varsis
1107.author: Anonymous
1107.description: This plug is about a goverment that producuces massive weapon and are allied with the aliens!!!  This plug will have many updates.

1108.title: velocityplus2.5.sit
1108.author: Anonymous
1108.description: Velocity Plus Plugin is a large plugin that adds a number of new and unique ships and weapons to Escape Velocity. A new series of missions are also on the way.

1109.title: viper.sit
1109.author: Anonymous
1109.description: After reading the EV bible I decided to design my first ship. The Viper is the result. If you like this kind of ship-animation idea, please email me with your opinion.

1111.title: vpk10.sit
1111.author: Anonymous
1111.description: Vorlon Planet-Killer adds the Vorlon ship as seen in the popular TV series Babylon 5.

732.title: A Loner to Die.sea
732.author: Anonymous
732.description: This makes all the governments attack you nomatter how much they like you. Only download if your really good. If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions than just e-mail me at kc3@amen.net or if you would like more plug-ins just visit my website at http://members.truepath.com/kc3/index.html/

893.title: free-ev
893.author: Anonymous
893.description: Free-EV is a total and very well made ship-graphics mod for Escape Velocity. It was supposed to be much more but the original creator stopped developing it a long time ago. I'm uploading this purely for archival purposes because it would otherwise most likely be lost forever. I'm also including a read-me with credit to the author and links to an archived version of the plug-ins homepage. If the real author would like to contact me, my e-mail can be found in the read-me.

3384.title: Map Patch for Escape Velocity
3384.author: Anonymous
3384.description: Patch creates new hyperjump links between long distance (and originally unconnected) points so that you don\'t have to waste five minutes jumping from one side of the galaxy to the next. Two hyperjump circular routes were made --Satori-1027-0595-1896-6564-4812 and Orion-Capella-Sirgil-Adhara-Guiron. Both rings connect to one another via Barnard. Also creates a modified Corvette you can use to take over the universe (particularly useful as an escort, too). Can\'t have hypergates like in EV Nova so this is the next best thing.

826.title: EliteFrontiers.sea
826.author: Anonymous
826.description:
The Elite Frontiers Galaxy is much larger than the standard Escape Velocity one.
There are three main govenments, two of which are at war. This war forms the core of
the missions in Elite Frontiers.
In addition though, there are several smaller independent governments and a number of 
corporate concers that have their own agendas and lead to subplots within the main game.

936.title: LevoFix
936.author: Anonymous
936.description: Tired of starting out on a planet that only has commodity exchange and a bar?  This plugin gives the starting planet, Levo, an outfitting area and a shipyard.

1049.title: Spartus1.5
1049.author: Anonymous
1049.description: Spartus is for those people who are getting bored of the originial EV galaxy. It gives every ship new stats, graphics, weapons, and more. Also, it adds new dudes, fleets, outfits, weapons, planets, goverments, junk, and missions. Enjoy! -Submitted by Madman

1063.title: Sting and Hive
1063.author: Anonymous
1063.description: "Sting and Hive" adds a fragile but swift fighter, the "Sting".  It is available only in bay form.  The bay, nicknamed "Hive", can hold up to 16 of the fighters, and the fighters and bay are quite cheap.

1097.title: torture.sit
1097.author: Anonymous
1097.description: This plug changes the bounty hunters to the most feared ship in the game. EV: Changes bounty hunter from Kestrel to Alien Cruiser. EVO: Changes bounty hunter from Crescent Warship to Voinian Dreadnought. Don't download unless you have no life! You've been warned. =)

878.title: extramissions1.01.sit
878.author: Anonymous
878.description: Extra Ships adds four unpurchasable ships: the Bulk Freighter, Executive Transport, Luxury Liner, and the Rebel Escort Carrier (availible w/completion of Rebel Alien Mission). It also provides these weapons: Swivel Laser Cannon, Rear Laser Turret, and the Forklift. When you play this plugin you will also see Light Freighters piloted by Rebels (in Rebellion space).

707.title: Supershield
707.author: Anonymous
707.description:
Quite a simple plug. Simply adds two new outfits, the Ultragenerator and the Ultrapacitor, and I bet you can guess what they do!  It's not really a cheat, because they take up a lot of space, they're kind of expensive, and- Oh, heck, its a cheat!

------------------------By: Lyra Belaqua (Formerly CyberDragon)

1037.title: ShipsGalore 2.5
1037.author: Anonymous
1037.description: This version of ShipsGalore, version 2.5, has 34 new ships and lots of weapons. 13 of the ships are available in bay form. All ships cost nothing, are available everywhere, and are very powerful. All outfits cost nothing, weigh nothing and are aso available everywhere. Some new ships are the Mineship and Confed Carrier. Some new weapons are mines, killer beams and Flame Missiles. There is also ultimate armour, shield capacity and recharge rate. Enjoy!!! E-Mail me at reued@lineone.net, and tell me what you think!

657.title: BestRamscoop
657.author: Anonymous
657.description: This Plug makes the Ramscoop alot better.  And for those pepole who use their after burner you wont lose fuel while useing it!

715.title: EV Plug-in Guide
715.author: Anonymous
715.description: This is as far as I know the first plug-in guide for EV, so far I am only reviewing 5 plugins so far, if you would like to submit a plug in for a review or think I have left out somthing from a review please email me at rptwisted@excite.com

827.title: Elphan Iv1.1.sit
827.author: Anonymous
827.description: The rumbling of Georges World was discovered to be Alien weapons tests. The Confederation and Rebellion, aided by a mercenary captain, banded together and wiped out the Alien interlopers on Georges World. Scientists discovered a hyperspace fluxpoint off of the THX-1138 system. In a system called Zencor, Aliens were found. This was the Alien homeworld. Once again the Aliens were defeated by conbined Rebel and Confed forces. At that time, a new player in the technologies industry, Elphan Inc. bought all the systems past THX-1138. They moved in and sealed the fluxpoiunt with a coded transmitter. Only a few have access. Elphan has been developing a ship to be in direct competition with the Maskirovka IPV-1 Corvette. This is the first in a series of plugs detailing the struggles between Elphan and Maskirovka. Will Maskirovka triumph? Or will Elphan fail? Only you decide.

868.title: EVNewData.sit
868.author: Anonymous
868.description: This is my first plug-in. It alters all ships and weapons in some way, shape and form. It also changes the government of some planets and systems, so download it and check it out! Newer versions might be on the way.

891.title: ForkliftRemover.sit
891.author: Anonymous
891.description: This tiny little plugin will allow you to take forklifts away from pilots that you spoiled by using the easter egg. (In my opinion, forklifts make the game less fun.) Contains both EV and EVO versions.

1047.title: Spartus1.2.sit
1047.author: Anonymous
1047.description: Spartus 1.2- Spartus 1.2 gives every ship in the original EV universe a new look, new stats, weapons, and a whole bunch of other stuff. It also adds other things,including goverments, weapons, planets, and a few surprises! Well worth the download. -Madman

706.title: Super Torpedo Folder
706.author: Anonymous
706.description: Every wondered why you have the most powerful ship in the game, and then a whole bunch of the same type of ship start attacking you? Ever wanted a wepon that could blow any ship, no matter what it shield or armmor is, sky high? Well, this is the answer! The super Torpedo is an upgraded version of the torpedo, with unlimited ammo, super speed, and the ability to blow any ship "sky high" in one shot!

678.title: Fireball 1.0.sea
678.author: Anonymous
678.description:
C'mon, you Developers! Fess up! All of us have our own "secret weapons", and it only seems fair to let everyone have one! This plugin adds the Fireball, the best weapon ever (including the infamous forklift!), to the EV universe, complete with its own graphics, sound, and sprite! Download it NOW!

Made by: CyberDragon, of course.

954.title: Modified strings
954.author: Anonymous
954.description: Caution: This plugin is for Confederation haters ONLY.  It also includes some galactic news updates about giant space boogers. -- Submitted by Stephen Johnson

1034.title: Scoutship .sit
1034.author: Anonymous
1034.description: This plug-in is pretty simple. It removes the shuttlecraft from the game, replacing it with the scoutship. It also replaces the scoutship's spot with a larger version of the scoutship, and changes the graphics for the scoutship and defender. It also alters some of the dude recourses. All graphics courtesy of Matthew Dailey's free shipyard at http://www.grand-novice.com/, any problems, email me at rj_schroeder@yahoo.com

653.title: Arcrania.sit
653.author: Anonymous
653.description:
Arcrania is a plugin which adds one new planet called (surprise) Arcrania. Just one (very long) hyperspace jump away from Levo, Arcrania is an advanced planet which offers all technologies for free. If you wanted to, you could equip your shuttlecraft with all weapons, gizmos, and upgrades. I am coming out with a similar arrangement for all the ships as well.
					By Malcolm Rosenthal

667.title: EmptyUniverse.sit
667.author: Anonymous
667.description: When you demand tribute, rather than defending, the planet evacuates in escape pods. And there are no other ships in the universe to get in your way. After you've done your conquering, just throw it away, and the full universe returns...with you as supreme ruler, of couse!

750.title: Argonaut1.sit
750.author: Anonymous
750.description: Argonaut 1.0 adds one new ship. In addition there are fourteen new or modified missions, thirteen modified ships, fifteen modified outfits, and six modified weapons. Many of the dudes and fleets have been realigned and several new personalities have been added. One of these, Medusa, has 20 million credits on board for the player lucky enough to find it and strong enough to take it.

758.title: avichai1.0.sit
758.author: Anonymous
758.description: Adds several new ships, with new graphics: Asp Heavy Fighter, Starfall Mark IX and the Avichai War Cruiser in addition to a new government. The new ships can be found at some shipyards.

803.title: deathstar2.9.8.sit
803.author: Anonymous
803.description: Here comes the latest and greatest version on the DeathStar. Due to popular demand, here comes DeathStar 2.9.8 with improved everything new ships, worlds, missions, sounds and even a few new tricks. May the Force be with you!

869.title: EVOShipsEtc2.0
869.author: Anonymous
869.description: This is the second version of "Escape Velocity Override Ships, Etc." It's bigger, and it's better! There are 4 new EVO ships, which include the Voinian Cruiser, Voinian Heavy Fighter, United Earth Fighter, and Miranu Heavy Freighter. The other ships that are included, which were included in the last version, are the United Earth Carrier, United Earth Cruiser, Voinian Dreadnought, Azdgari Warship, Crescent Warship, and my own creation, the Supershuttle (a shuttlecraft with lots of shields, space, and weapons). I've also included bays for the United Earth Fighter, Voinian Heavy Fighter, the Kestrel, and the Supershuttle. I hope you enjoy this plugin!

912.title: gundrones1.31.sit
912.author: Anonymous
912.description: Gundrones are small, protable, fully robotic proton turents which let a combat pilot drop next to an enemy. Give the order to fire and up to 15 gundrones will destroy the target.

924.title: Janiss Plugin 1.0
924.author: Anonymous
924.description:
This plugin adds one government, one system, two planets, two stations and a system "Janis's System"
P.S my name is pronunced yanis not janis

979.title: NFSA 1.2.1
979.author: Anonymous
979.description: NFSA, New Fresh Ships Anyone? This plug in adds 5 new ships, Defender Carrier, Picon ,Molicon, MOPS(MiniObjectPiconianShip), Big Freighter. New for 1.2.1 is that I have add some cool icons for the Read Me! file, the folder and, (of course) the plug itself. Made by Hampus Lindin, Zupmah Artworks, Inc. zupmah_jidder@hotmail.com DOWNLOAD NOW! IT IS WORTH IT!!!

980.title: ninnyman10.sit
980.author: Anonymous
980.description: This plug adds the Ninnymann Fighter to the EV Universe. There are versions for both EV and EVO. Submitted by Mouse (Ambrosia SW Webboards).

1055.title: Starfighters.sit
1055.author: Anonymous
1055.description: Starfighters adds five new ships and two new weapons to the EV universe, along with dudes and personalities to make them a part of the game. The ships include a light, medium, and heavy fighter, a light warship, and a highly upgradable 'merchant' cruiser.

1065.title: Super Pirates
1065.author: Anonymous
1065.description: Never found strange that pirate Argosies attack you withÉonly 2 laser turrets, like a freighter captain? Do you think it's too easy to crush pirates? Or do you want the boundary trader job to be far more difficult, for your game pleasure? Use this plug! It makes the 4 main ships pirates use (Argosy, clipper, corvette and kestrel) more powerful, but only for pirates! Not for newbies!

1073.title: Talon11u.sit
1073.author: Anonymous
1073.description: To update Talon to 1.1, copy the Talon  1.1 Update file into your EV Plug-Ins folder. Do not remove the Talon plugin file. Also, do not remove the Talon  1.1 Update unless you want to stop playing Talon, as that will downgrade Talon back to 1.0. Talon will only operate as 1.1 when the 1.1 Update file is in the EV Plug-Ins folder. You must have Talon installed for this plugin to work.

1093.title: tiefighter1.02.sit
1093.author: Anonymous
1093.description: This is an entirely new ship for EV... it performs like the Defender but better in basically every area, and costs a tad more. It's a pirate-operated ship. _Sky_ did the graphics.

1116.title: williams1.52.sit
1116.author: Anonymous
1116.description: Adds the Williams system (near Perseus), the Mafia, 25 new missions, a new Alien race with ships/weapons (purchasable), and some high level pirate missions.

755.title: AsteroidBeam
755.author: Anonymous
755.description: This adds 3 new beams with 3 colors. they are really powerful but dont piss off any gonverment cruiser...

778.title: bountyplus21.sit
778.author: Anonymous
778.description: Bounty Plus takes you inside the mysterious organization known as the Bounty Hunters Guild, a loose association of soldiers of fortune, hot-shot fighter pilots, wealthy, powerful merchant princes, and outlaws looking for a second chance...  This version (2.1) finally fixes those annoying bugs, and fixes a few other things.  Have fun. -- Andrew Glasgow

788.title: CleanRecordv11.sit
788.author: Anonymous
788.description: This is an upgrade for my plug-in, Clean Record v1.0. It has cooler graphics and descriptions. For those of you who dont know, Clean Record clears your records with every government in the galaxy.

833.title: enterprise0.96.sit
833.author: Anonymous
833.description: This plug adds the Starship Enterprise to the game. Now you too can pilot your very own Constellation Class Crusier (no TNG, thank you).

889.title: Floating Fortress 1.2.1.sea
889.author: Anonymous
889.description:
This is a plug-in a made a couple of years ago, but I never got around to posting it.

The Floating Fortress plug adds a new ship (which is invincible), which looks like the ship in Ambrosia's "Maelstrom." It also adds a new system, which has a really high tribute if you dominate it (which isn't that hard).

Enjoy!

1046.title: Spartus1.1.sea
1046.author: Anonymous
1046.description: Spartus 1.1- A plug in for Escape Velocity that gives all the regular EV ships entirely diffrent, including graphics, stats, weapons, and discriptions. It also adds new weapons, and even a new person. -Madman-

836.title: EscortCarrier11.sit
836.author: Anonymous
836.description: Escort Carrier 1.1 is an updater to EC 1.0. This version is mainly a fixer for all of the mistakes in EC 1 (like a red window on the ship). It also features a better target pic. Enjoy!

928.title: KestrelCollection
928.author: Anonymous
928.description: This plugin adds lots of different Kestrels to the game, all of which can be bought. If you have any comments or questions, e-mail me at reued@lineone.net.

843.title: EV RadicalColumn 3.0 .sit
843.author: Anonymous
843.description:
2/9/02
Nebula

EV RadicalColumn 3.0 is a small and fun plugin that replaces the games green side column with one made very radical colors!!!

850.title: Ev Better Graphics 1.0.1
850.author: Anonymous
850.description:
Better Graphics 1.0.1

This fixes a couple of sprites. The bulk freighter is still weird because it is just too big for the game I think. If anyone finds the correct x + y sizes please either post it or tell me.
This plug is NOT compatible with any other plug that replaces the origonal ships. Every thing else should be fine though.
David@ars-nova.com

852.title: EV Destroyer 1.0.sea
852.author: Anonymous
852.description: This plug adds 40 missions, 40 personalities, and 32 dudes. This plug-in is only for pilots that beat an alien mission. It does not seem to be much, but it is hard to beat. Ships begin to disappear around the Serpens Nebula, and questions about aliens came up: Why had it taken so long for them to return after the war? Did the aliens reproduce?    By Destroyer E

940.title: LotsoBays10.sit
940.author: Anonymous
940.description: This plugin adds a bay for each type of ship lacking one. It also adds fighters to fill the bays. Sorry, it doesnt add bays already incorporated into the game (lightning, alien fighter, manta, etc). It does, however, add graphics that I cut  pasted myself. If you want better graphics, they might be in the next one  have SHADOWS (see Rapier Bay picture in the game) You can have a rapid-firing bay that costs 25 credits, and 100 fighters costing only one single credit each, the best part is... they dont weigh anything! Even with your fighters, you still want to watch out for me. I incorporate myself into all my plugins.

953.title: mmbay.sit
953.author: Anonymous
953.description: This plug in adds a few new ship bays including a Frigate, Destroyer, and Rapier bay.  It also adds a new ship.

956.title: mostwanted1.0.sit
956.author: Anonymous
956.description: For serious EV players only. It has extremely difficult missions that may take you a while to finish (try killing 3 Alien Cruisers on the first try).

1004.title: PlanetsPlug2000
1004.author: Anonymous
1004.description: Sorry about last time...i forgot to add what its about...:) Planets Plug 2000 adds some more systems, new planets in existing systems, some weapons, and lot o ships...some which need the alien missions done...thanx again and look for updates!!

1017.title: RebelEscortCarrier
1017.author: Anonymous
1017.description:
Captain Thomas 1.0
Changes the coloured bands on the Escort Carrier to red, makes the Escort Carrier available for purchase after the Rebel Alien mission (if you want if for some reason), adds the Escort Carrier to the normal game (2 düdes and 1 flët), adds a few përs Escort Carriers. All additions are regardless of Confederate Escort Carrier missions.

1026.title: ROPupdater1.2
1026.author: Anonymous
1026.description:
REALM OF PREY 1.0 -- 1.2 Updater

To use, simply place the enclosed update in the same plug-ins folder as the REALM OF PREY plugs.  You should not need to start a new pilot file as the bugs are not fatal.  DO NOT RENAME THE FILE OR IT WILL NOT LOAD PROPERLY.

1030.title: Salvager.sit
1030.author: Anonymous
1030.description: This plugin adds one new ship that will allow you to disable freighters and steal all their cargo and ammo. The ship has 20,000 tons of cargo space and about the same weapon space.

1041.title: SMV.sit
1041.author: Anonymous
1041.description: Shawn Michaels is back, and whether you love wrestling or hate it, Shawn Michaels Velocity is sure to put a smile on your face. Lovingly crafted with Snapz, PICS to SPRITE, Graphic Converter, AppleWorks, Animation Creator, ResEdit, Amadeus and a ploretha of other programs, SMV is finally ready for release! It adds new startup music and a new graphic for the shuttlecraft. Not much now, but updates will add new missions and perhaps a wrestling based government! Get out your shades, 'cause HBK isn't waiting for anyone!

1075.title: TargetEnhancer105r2.sit
1075.author: Anonymous
1075.description: An alternative to EV Target Graphics, Target Enhancer 1.05 adds a black lining around the targeted ship. It also uses the newest graphics for the Alien ships unlike EV Target Graphics.

839.title: EV expand v1.1.sit
839.author: Anonymous
839.description:
this is the next version of ev expand, it fixs a bug that stops you from buying the new ship that's in the plug it also lets you buy alien ships and weapons but at a high price so it's not really a cheat.


 e mail me at sam6519575@yahoo.com if you have anything to say about my plugs made by (AK)clownhunter

685.title: Hectorina .sit
685.author: Anonymous
685.description: We are all shocked by the news 'Hector' is a girl. This plugin fixes Escape Velocity, Cap'n Hector is now Cap'n Hectorina. Enjoy!

830.title: EmpireVsRebellion.sit
830.author: Anonymous
830.description: This plug-in is about the struggle of the Rebellion agianst the Empire. It centers you right in the middle of the conflict because there are no civilian ships. You must choose whether you want to join the Rebellion or the Empire. This plug replaces ALL of the Escape Velocity ships with Star Wars ships. Even the Alien ships have been replaced (with platforms that have big guns, heh heh). The weapons are changed to Star Wars weapons, like everything else. Everything is changed to Star Wars except the missions and the planets. It is suggested that you dont play the missions because they give the game a less Star Wars taste.

652.title: antimatterbeam.sit
652.author: Anonymous
652.description: Pesky fighters on your tail? Having trouble killing those annoying aliens? Got a mission that you simply cannot beat? Fear not, the Antimatter Beam is the solution to your problems! This weapon is powerful enough to obliterate even the toughest of vessels with a short blast. It is the ultimate instrument of destruction!

662.title: Cool Plugin.sit
662.author: Anonymous
662.description: This Plugin makes every thing including ships cost 1cr and all outfits weigh nothing and you can have as many outfits as you want!

783.title: CascadeIndustries.sit

Every ship's shields have been raised at least by 1,000, most ships' armor has been increased, and, depending on the type of ship, the max turrets have been increased, too! No default turrets have been placed.  The Shuttlecraft now has a max of 5 Turrets, Kestrel 15, Confed/Rebel Cruisers 35! All the ships' and outfitts' prices have been lowered by 3 decimals (Forklift was 9999999 and is 9999) and no ships require special missions to be done! Unfortunately, you can ony get Confed ships on Luna in the Sol system and Rebel ships in the Satori system, just like before.  There's even new ships, too! I can't take the credit for these, though, because I took them from the Maelstrom 1.5 plugin. The included ships are drastically improved versions of the Maelstrom Mark IV, Large Shenobi and Small Shenobi.  This is not entirely my own work. I only took and edited the original EV Data, so it will look exactly like the original.  If you would like to contact me, my e-mail is frogman31994@aol.com Look out for version 1.1, hopefully coming soon!

-21 new missions

The Privateers have made an alliance with the Rebels (you have helped of course), but the Confeds don't like it and make an alliance with new kind of Aliens, The NSF Aliens (If you want to know what NSF stands for, play the missions all through the end, or be a little patient.). I let you imagine the remaining part of the plot (to know more stop reading this damn thing and play the game, ACTION IS BETTER THAN WORDS LET'S HAVE FUN).

1110.title: vorlons.sit
1110.author: Anonymous
1110.description: This plug-in is inspired by the Babylon 5 Vorlon alien race. At present it is not yet finished but you can download it and try it out.

1115.title: wicked0.b9.sit
1115.author: Anonymous
1115.description:
This plug adds the following:
Destroyer Beam Turret, Tractor Beam Puller, Galaxy Map, Impossible Armor, some missions and the planet Kal-El.

1118.title: xenhancments.sit
1118.author: Anonymous
1118.description: XcomputerMissions, XlightningBay, XmassExpansion, XshieldCapcitor and XshipUpgrades. Makes standard missions to have a stronger pirate part in them.

1119.title: YDWTK1.0.sit
1119.author: Anonymous
1119.description: This plug-in features totally different combat ratings and legal statuses. It beefs up all rebel ships. The Demonfire borrows the Kestrel's graphic, but can win against one Confed Cruiser. There is a totally new "ship" called the Turret Mine, that is placed in Sol and Satori systems as defenses.

1127.title: DCYCNamer.sit
1127.author: Anonymous
1127.description: This is a pretty good name creator. It is completely random and it comes with several different dialects. Enjoy:)

1159.title: PilotConverter2.sit
1159.author: Anonymous
1159.description: Pilot Converter reads pilot files from the original Escape Velocity or Escape Velocity: Override and converts the data to Escape Velocity: Nova pilot files. Now you don't need to make a new pilot if you want to keep playing in the original EV universes using one of the EVC (Escape Velocity Classic) or EVO plugins made for use with Nova.

1072.title: T.G.W
1072.author: Anonymous
1072.description: This is the start of a great war. It is just the demo but you can be a planet, a fleet , or a warship. It is my first plugin and I think it's ok. However it almost completly changes the graphics. For example the radar and menu. Email me at Martin@jencka.com. ENJOY!!!

756.title: AsteroidShips10.sit
756.author: Anonymous
756.description: Contains the Asteriod Ship! Very hard to spot when fighting but a lot of fun to fight. ADDS 9 ships, over 12 outfits, 20 missions (five must be unlocked after playing the first fifteen). Compatible with version 1.0.5 of EV.

775.title: BOTKupdater1.1
775.author: Anonymous
775.description: BROTHERHOOD OF THE KESTREL 1.0 -- 1.1 UPDATER.  This simple patch repairs a very minor  mission probability mistake in the "For King And Country" campaign.  To use, simply place the update in the same Plug-ins folder as BOTK.  You should not need to start a new pilot file as the bug is NOT fatal.

793.title: ConEx12u.sit
793.author: Anonymous
793.description: A patch to bring ConEx 1.1 up to ConEx 1.2.  If you don't already have ConEx1.1, download the complete ConEx 1.2 package, not this update.

815.title: DialogExpander1.0.sea
815.author: Anonymous
815.description: Dialog Expander 1.0 by Coraxus - This contains sets of plug-ins that expand the windows of dialog boxes when you are viewing the galaxy map, hailing a planet, or checking your player info. Each plug-ins are designed to cover various ranges from 640x480 to 1280x1024. Dialog Expander also contains plug-ins compatible for the Override version. Comments or questions, notify me at prefectural@yahoo.com

875.title: evtg-swana.sit
875.author: Anonymous
875.description: An EV Target Graphics for the all-new Star Wars: A New Alliance plug in. See EV Target Graphics for more information.

898.title: GAE Landscape.sit
898.author: Anonymous
898.description: This file contains 9 BRAND NEW landscape graphics for Alliance worlds. Developed with the help of David Padula, this file is not essential to gameplay but will add flavor to it. WARNING: It will cost 3-4 megs of alloted EV memory to run.

904.title: Goldilocks10b2.sit
904.author: Anonymous
904.description: This plugin is the first in a series of plugins I'm working on, which revolve aroung Stegz Research Industries. They will be good to you at first, but there's something behind the scenes that will shock you... It has 1 new ship, 4 outfits, 15 missions (all longish) and loads of other stuff. The plotline follows a series of missions with you working for the SRI, and helping discover new planets.

915.title: hft1.1.sit
915.author: Anonymous
915.description: A combination of four custom designed weapons, to give you some added firepower above and beyond the stock stuff. 4 brand new weapons for EV: 2 Projectile, 1 Laser, 1 Missle.

920.title: HyperionProject12.sit
920.author: Anonymous
920.description: Hyperion Inc. is a company that makes advanced starfighters and weaponry. This plug-in for Escape Velocity will let you test drive some of its products, like the Hyperion fighter, an assortment of plasma weapons, and the deadly ion torpedo launcher.

971.title: NewBrodania101.sit
971.author: Anonymous
971.description: This plug-in currently adds 1 new ship, 1 new government, 1 new system, 1 new planet, 2 new people and a bunch of fleets.

976.title: newplanets1.03.sit
976.author: Anonymous
976.description: This is a patch for my "New Planet and Ships" plug-in which fixes a bug which would sometimes corrupt the weapons on the Leviathan.

992.title: PDAInc503.sit
992.author: Anonymous
992.description: P.D.A. Inc. 5.0.3 adds one new ship, a wide variety of new weapons and outfits, new systems and docks, new governments, and a bundle of missions in which you help James Bond XIV overcome and destroy the evil Privateers.

993.title: PDAIncForward105.sit
993.author: Anonymous
993.description: If you've played any previous P.D.A. Inc.'s you'll notice that this one has all of them combined into one plug-in and has improved graphics for most things (also includes 3D target graphics all made by me except for the target graphics for the original EV ships those 3D target graphics were provided courtesy of the EV Target Graphics plug-in).  This plugin adds a whole bunch of new ships, outfits, and missions.

998.title: phoenixcorvette1.12.sit
998.author: Anonymous
998.description: Has one completely new ship, all the original EV ships are now modified, theres also 5 new outfits, including 2 weapons, a shield, a fuel scoop, and galactic map, enjoy!

1064.title: strife-teaser.sit
1064.author: Anonymous
1064.description: This is a teaser version of a full plugin to be released sometime in summer 1998. It features three new ships with all new graphics, plus two weapons, and one fleet. The final version of Strife will be much larger and will feature a richer gaming enviroment.

1069.title: switchgovt1.00.sit
1069.author: Anonymous
1069.description: Contains two plug-ins: "Switch to Rebellion" and "Switch to Confederation." These allow you to change your alliance from Confed to Rebel and vice-versa.

1112.title: walker0.42b2.sit
1112.author: Anonymous
1112.description: Has two systems (one invisible), dudes, two persons, two govts, three missions, two outfits, and one weapon. New govt. is Atland, and come from the hidden system.

1113.title: warriors.sit
1113.author: Anonymous
1113.description: Warriors is very neat plug-in with lots of new weapons and starships. (This plug is only compatible with version Escape Velocity 1.0.5!)

1131.title: Ev Plug-in Ticker II
1131.author: Anonymous
1131.description: I know its kinda soon to be making a second version but this one you can make "ANY" Escape Velocity file without using those pesky keys. It even includes the Templates file and the KC3 pilot's resource file to get you started.

1082.title: thamahawk 37 morpher
1082.author: Anonymous
1082.description: This is a small plug-in and holds only a ship. The ship is named thamahawk 37 morpher and can also morph to a smaller ship. It's fast and has good cargo and costs only 6mill so why not download now??

855.title: EV Mods
855.author: Anonymous
855.description: From Aviator Computer Productions comes EV Mods. This is one of my first real big plugs.  This Plug features: 8 new missions, 19 new weapons, 13 new ships(some w/ modified graphics others with game graphics),svereal  new fleets, 1 new outfit,  a new spob in the satori system and more. Also there is a direct jumplink between Sol and Satori. This Plug has a few graphics problems in the outfits, that I'm asking if someone who has more experience than me could possibly fix. Enjoy!

3311.title: Supershield1.0
3311.author: Anonymous
3311.description: The same as supershield for Nova and Override.

3445.title: Kestrel Plus
3445.author: General Cade Smart
3445.description: Kestrel Plus allows you to get a Kestrel that is stronger than the one you get from the Deliver Kestrel Parts mission. And stronger than the Kestrel itself! The Atinoda Kestrel. You get a ship that has as much shields as a Confederate Frigate, as much armor as a Confederate Cruiser, and more Torpedoes than any ship in the galexy. You also have two Torpedo launchers. You get 3 Proton Turrets and 6 Proton Cannons for more primary weapons power than any ship in the galaxy. You also get four Lightnings, which I have seen that they can destroy a Kestrel by themselves. You have 200 tons of weapon space, meaning you can buy anything you want. Like dozens of Torpedoes and still have a lot space left over. 160 tons of cargo space means you can buy a lot of Mass Expansions to get even more weapon space. Compatible with my other plug-in Blackthorne Kestrel, so you can use both of them at the same time.
